anya-e0401n0:5_2: Paramatthadīpanīti ettha attho duvidho padhānatthoca pariyāyatthoca.
anya-e0401n0:6_17: Yattha ca mahābodhisattānaṃ buddhabhāvatthāya pathamamahābhinīhārakālādīsu ekappahārenapathavikampanādīnipavattanti.
anya-e0401n0:6_19: Jātikkhettemahāsareyassa ekassa saddhammaraṃsijālino mahāsūrassa udayā tasmiṃ jātikkhette mahāsare janambujāpabujjhiṃsūtiyojanā.
anya-e0401n0:8_0: Evaṃ buddhassapaṇāmaṃ katvā attanā icchitaṃ paṇāmappayojanaṃ pariṇāmento “sañjāta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:9_0: Evaṃ sappayojanaṃ paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni sanidānaṃ ganthappaṭiññaṃ karonto “porāṇakehī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:10_0: Tattha dvīhi gāthāhi sakāraṇaṃ yācanaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:10_3: Tattha ādigāthāyaṃ “abhidhammatthasaṅgahe porāṇakehi viññūhi vaṇṇitā bahūvaṇṇanā idhalokamhidissantī”ti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:12_28: So hi ganthārabbhavidhānassa idhaparisamāpanaṃ pariniṭṭhānaṃ ñāpetuṃ ganthārabbhavākyassapariyante yojito.
anya-e0401n0:14_1: Evaṃ ganthārabbhavidhānaṃ katvā idāni ādigāthāya sambandhaṃ dassento “abhidhammatthasaṅgaha”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:14_19: purisoti vuttegacchati padena vutto yokoci gacchanto vacanatthonāma.
anya-e0401n0:14_20: Purisoti padenadassito padhānattho adhippetattho abhidheyyattho nāmāti.
anya-e0401n0:16_0: Cittaṃ cetasikaṃ rūpaṃ, nibbānamiti sabbathā. ti
anya-e0401n0:17_1: Evaṃ vuttattāyevaca tecattāro abhidhammatthā eva idhapadhānatthabhūtāti ca, -
anya-e0401n0:17_2: padhānatthāeva idhaganthābhidheyya bhāvena adhippetāti caviññāyatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:18_3: Idha ca saṅgahatthā eva abhidheyyabhāvena adhippetāti vuttaṃ abhidheyyo abhidhammattha saṅgahappadenāti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n0:18_4: Teabhidhammatthā saṅgahappakaraṇaṃ pattāpi abhidhammatthā evanāma honti,
anya-e0401n0:18_9: Tadeva idha abhidheyyo nāma siyāti vuttaṃ “saṅgahitabhāvopi abhidheyyo yevā”tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:18_26: Sā brammaraṭṭhe tiriyapabbatavāsinā therenakataṃ cūḷaṭīkaṃ upādāya mahāṭīkāti pākaṭā.
anya-e0401n0:19_4: Abhidhammatthapadaṃ pana saṅgahaṇakiriyāpakāraṃna vadatīti vuttaṃ “taṃ nasundara”nti.
anya-e0401n0:19_15: Saṅgahaganthonāma pāḷiyaṃtattha tattha vippakiṇṇedhamme ekattha sabhāgarāsikaraṇavasena pavatto gantho.
anya-e0401n0:19_39: Phalānubhavanatthāya tatthatattha phalānubhavanakiccesu payujjīyatīti payojananti pivadanti.
anya-e0401n0:19_44: Yathātaṃ asukasmiṃ raṭṭhe sammādevo vuṭṭhoti vutte taṃ raṭṭhaṃsu bhikkhanti viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:19_45: Asukaraṭṭhaṃ subhikkhantivutte tasmiṃ raṭṭhe sammādevo vuṭṭhoti viññāyatīti.
anya-e0401n0:19_46: Payojanaṃ pana abhidhammattha saddena dassetabbaṃ natthi,
anya-e0401n0:19_48: Sāmatthiyadassane pana suṭṭhu paripuṇṇavacanaṃ icchitabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:19_49: Itarathā aniṭṭhatthappasaṅgopi siyāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ na sundara”nti vatvā “nahī”tiādinā hetuvākyena tadatthaṃ sādheti.
anya-e0401n0:20_1: Evaṃ sappayojane pañcapiṇḍattheti ettha pañcapiṇḍatthe dassetvā idāni tesaṃpañcannaṃ piṇḍatthānaṃ visuṃvisuṃ
anya-e0401n0:20_8: Evaṃ kiccapaccayānaṃ katthaci sakkattha dīpanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:20_9: Sakavacanaṃ pāḷivacanena sādhetuṃ “yathāhā”ti pucchitvā pāḷigāthaṃ āhari.
anya-e0401n0:20_11: Anantare vuttassa atthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ kathaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āha,
anya-e0401n0:20_13: kathaṃ ṭīkāyaṃ āhāti evaṃ yathārahaṃ attho veditabbo.
anya-e0401n0:20_18: Natthi kutoci hetuto bhayaṃ yesaṃ te akuto bhayā.
anya-e0401n0:20_24: Tehi porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu tattha tattha vippakiṇṇepakiṇṇakavinicchayeyuttaṭṭhānesu saṅgahetvā abhinava aṭṭhakathāyo karonti.
anya-e0401n0:20_29: Te antarāya nīvāraṇameva icchantīti kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce.
anya-e0401n0:20_30: Tesaṃ vacanena viññāyatīti dassetuṃ saṅgahakāra gāthaṃ āhari.
anya-e0401n0:21_12: Khetta sampattiyā ca ajjhāsaya sampattiyā ca hotīti dassetuṃ “anuttaresū”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:21_24: Aññaṃ puññaṃ atikkamanto sayati pavattatīti atissayo.
anya-e0401n0:21_31: kathañca okāsalābhaṃ karotīti āha “sayaṃ payoga sampattibhāveṭhatvā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n0:21_32: Tattha payogasampattināma atīta puññakammānaṃ balavataraṃ upatthambhakakammaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:21_39: Cattāro paccayā ca upaṭṭhākakulāni ca ārakkha devatādayo ca sukhuppatti paccayā.
anya-e0401n0:21_40: Tehi paccayehi pāmojja bahu lassa therassa santāne rattidivaṃ pītipassaddhisukhasamādhīnaṃ pavattiyā ajjhattabhūtā utucittāhārā ca ati paṇītā honti.
anya-e0401n0:21_41: Tehi samuṭṭhitā sarīraṭṭhakadhātuyo ca atipaṇītā eva hutvā upabrūhanti.
anya-e0401n0:21_42: Tattha sarīraṭṭhakadhātuyo nāma pathavi ādayo vātapittasemhādayoca.
anya-e0401n0:21_55: apuñña kammānīti tānitividhāni akusalakammāni dūrato apanītāneva honti,
anya-e0401n0:21_59: Abhivādetabbānaṃ mātāpitu samaṇabrāhmaṇādīnaṃ abhivādanakammegaruṃkaraṇaṃ abhivādana sīlaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:21_61: Guṇavuddhavayavuddhe apaceti attānaṃ nīcavutti karaṇena pūjetisīlenāti vuddhāpacāyī.
anya-e0401n0:21_66: Laddhaguṇoti ca taṃtaṃpasaṅga visodhanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā laddhovisuddho attho vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:21_67: Tathā vacana sāmatthiyena laddho atthantaropi ayamidha adhippeto.
anya-e0401n0:21_73: Javanavinicchaye yasmā antarāya nīvāraṇaṃnāma diṭṭhadhamme icchitabbaṃ phalaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:21_74: Diṭṭha dhammo ca pathama javanassa vipākakkhettaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:21_75: Tasmā upatthambhana kiccaṃ patvāpi pathama javana cetanā eva idhapariyattāti adhippāyena “diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:21_76: Sā pana pathama javana cetanā upatthambhana kiccaṃ patvāpi sabbadubbalā evasiyā. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:21_78: Sesa cetanāyo eva balavatiyo siyuṃ. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:21_86: Itarathā ‘kabaḷīkāro āhāro āhārasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo’ti vibhatto siyāti.
anya-e0401n0:21_88: Evaṃ vandanāyapayojanaṃ dīpetvā idāni sesānaṃ piṇḍatthānaṃ payojanaṃ dīpetuṃ “yasmāpanā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:21_93: Imaṃ uggahetvā sudullabhe abhidhammatthe ca anāyāsena jānissāma,
anya-e0401n0:21_94: tammūlakassa ca anupādā parinibbānantassa payojanassabhāgino bhavissāmāti cittuppāda sambhavatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:23_4: Vākyā rambhoti ca mūlavākye yaṃ yaṃ vattabbaṃ avuttaṃ,
anya-e0401n0:23_7: Kathaṃpanaaviparītatthe pavatto sammāsaddo asesa byāpanaṃ dīpetīti pucchāya purimatthame vabyatirekato
anya-e0401n0:23_8: ca anvayato ca puna vitthārento “tathāhī”tiādimāha. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:23_11: “Attano visaye evā”ti attano ñāṇavisaye eva tesaṃ visayocāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:23_12: Yasmā ekopi dhammo kāladesasantānādibhedena ananta bhedo hoti.
anya-e0401n0:23_13: Tasmā padesañāṇikā paccekabuddhādayo ekadhammaṃpi sabbākārato jānituṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e0401n0:23_30: “Sabbaññumahābhavaṅga”nti sabbesaṃsabbaññubuddhānaṃ pacchimabhave paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya pavattaṃ aṭṭhasu
anya-e0401n0:23_33: “Niccakālaṃ upaṭṭhahantī”ti sabbakālaṃ upaṭṭhānākāra pattā hutvā tiṭṭhanti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:23_39: Tasmā parittakaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ekakkhaṇe mahantānaṃ dhammānaṃ napahotīti codakassa adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:24_0: Evaṃ sammāsaddassa atthaṃ vicāretvā idāni saṃsaddassa atthaṃ vicārento “saṃsaddopanā”tiādimāha. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:24_14: atha kho yāvadeva tatīya catutthāruppabhavappaṭilābhāya saṃvattantīti evaṃ ādīnavaṃ disvā chaḍḍitattā.
anya-e0401n0:25_1: “Pubbe ananussutesudhammesū”ti imasmiṃ bhave ito pubbe kassacisantike ananussute sucatussacca dhammesu.
anya-e0401n0:25_4: Tappaccayā tadanantarā evasabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pātubbhavatīti vuttaṃ “tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti.
anya-e0401n0:25_5: “Tadanantarā”ti ca arahatta maggavīthiyāca catunnaṃ paccavekkhana vārānañca anantare kāleti attho.
anya-e0401n0:25_14: summavacananti evaṃ anukkamena sattannaṃ vibhattīnaṃ nāmāni āgatānīti.
anya-e0401n0:26_1: “Vasibhāva”nti ettha attano vasaṃ vattetuṃ samatthatā saṅkhātosatti viseso vasonāma.
anya-e0401n0:26_7: Katthaci pana “vasī”ti itthiliṅgapadaṃpi dissati=tatrimā pañcavasiyo āvajjanavasīsamāpajjanavasī=tiādīsu.
anya-e0401n0:28_3: “Itikiṃdutīyenā”ti iti tasmā dutīyena atulapadena kiṃ payojanaṃ atthīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:28_11: “Nakevalaṃ vandanāya antarāyanīvāraṇameva icchi tabbaṃ hotī”ti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:28_16: Kathaṃ pana vandanāya paññāpāṭavādi atthosambhavatīti vuttaṃ “anussatiṭṭhānesū”tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:28_19: “Tikkhāsūrāhutvāvahatī”ti gambhīresu attha byañjana padesu amandā vissaṭṭhā hutvā vahati.
anya-e0401n0:28_23: Tasmā tāni viggahatthaṃ ajānantānaṃ santike nāma mattāni sampajjantīti vuttaṃ “yathāvutta vacanatthayogepi…pe…
anya-e0401n0:28_26: Māgadhabhāsāhi mūlabhāsāti ca ariyabhāsāti ca māgadhabhāsāti ca pāḷibhāsāti ca dhammaniruttīti ca sabhāvaniruttīti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:28_28: So evasakatthoti ca vacanatthoti ca viggahatthoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:28_32: Tathāhi anāthapiṇḍikoseṭṭhi rājagahaṃ anupatto buddho loke uppannoti sutvā udānaṃ udānesi=ghosopi kho esodullabho lokasmiṃ yadidaṃ buddho=ti.
anya-e0401n0:28_33: Tasmā buddhoti nāmaṃpi loke mahantaṃ sudullabhaṃguṇapadaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:28_35: “Sabhāvaniruttiṃ ajānantānaṃ pana padasahassaṃ vuccamānaṃpī”ti tiṭṭhatu ekaṃ atulapadaṃ,
anya-e0401n0:28_37: Tādisāhi janā idaṃ loke mahantaṃ guṇapadantipi najānanti.
anya-e0401n0:29_8: Dhammato pana sineru pabbata rājassa santike sakkhara kathalāniviyasampajjantīti.
anya-e0401n0:29_14: katamaṃ pana tāva acchariyaṃ bhavatīti āha “sampatijātassā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n0:29_19: = Uḷāro obhāso pāturahosi atikkammadevānaṃ devānubhāva=ntihi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:29_20: Tena obhāsena pharitā sabbe pathavi pabbatādayo jātiphalikakkhandhāviya suppasannā honti.
anya-e0401n0:29_25: Evaṃ acchambhi vācaṃ nicchāresi dhammatāya sañcoditattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:29_31: aññaṃ pitato acchariyataraṃ atthīti dassetuṃ “yadāpanā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:29_32: Pāramitā guṇehi tena sadiso kocinattheva thapetvā aññe ca mahābodhi satteti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:29_40: Tadeva ca sabbesaṃpi bodhisattānaṃ niyatabyākaraṇappaṭilābhe padhānakāraṇanti dassetuṃ “sāvakabodhisattāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:29_45: Bodhi atthāya paṭipannā sattā bodhisattātipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:29_46: Buddha suññepiloke kammassakatāñāṇe ṭhatvā vaṭṭadukkhato mokkhadhammapariyesino sattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:29_49: Pathaviyaṃ paṃsucuṇṇāni viya pakatiyā vaputhubhūtājanāti puthujjanā.
anya-e0401n0:29_53: Ayaṃ bhāvoyeva tesaṃ bhūmīti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:29_58: bodhisattaniyato ca cūḷasotāpannaniyato ca ariya sotāpannaniyato ca.
anya-e0401n0:29_62: Tesu bodhisattaniyato idha adhippetoti vuttaṃ “ekena pariyāyenā”tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:29_63: Vattabbamevanatthitesaṃ dvinnaṃ bodhisattānaṃ pārami pavicayaññāṇa sampattiyā vinā niyatabyākaraṇa lābhā saṅkāya eva abhāvatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:30_12: tulayitabbo aññena saha pamitabboti tuloti evaṃ idhavuttena kamma sādhana vacanattheneva.
anya-e0401n0:30_13: “Tadatthasiddhito”ti tassa vibhāvaniyaṃ vuttassa duvidhassa atthassa siddhito.
anya-e0401n0:30_21: Vatticchaṃ anugato sammuti saṅketavohāra siddhattāti samāso.
anya-e0401n0:30_30: tatopi eko akāroti katvā samītatthe dutīyo taddhita akāropi assutoyevanāmahoti.
anya-e0401n0:31_1: Evaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ padattha saṃvaṇṇanaṃ katvā idāni tesaṃyeva atthuddhārasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ karonto “imehi panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:31_5: Tassa pubbabhāge buddhabhāvatthāya anupadadhammavipassanāvasena chattiṃsa koṭi satasahassa saṅkhānaṃ
anya-e0401n0:31_6: devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakapphalasamāpattīnaṃ pubbabhāga vipassanāñāṇampi mahāvajiraññāṇanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:31_10: Pajahanti pahātabbedhammeetenātivā pahānanti katvā taṃ aggamaggaññāṇampitaṃ vipassanāñāṇampi pahānanti
anya-e0401n0:31_11: vuccatīti iminā adhippāyena “pahānasampadāyaṃ vā sā saṅgahitā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:31_17: avītikkamosilantiādīsuviya etthahi pahānasīlaṃ nāma yathā vuttena atthena veramaṇisīlamevāti yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:31_18: Pahānaṃ nāma kocidhammo nahotīti adhippāye pana satipahāna sīsena pahānasādhakaṃ tadevañāṇadvayaṃ upacārenapahānanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:31_19: Itarathā pahānasampadā nāma asārā aphalāti āpajjeyyāti.
anya-e0401n0:31_20: Paccekabuddha buddhasāvakā kilese pajahantāpi vāsanāya saha appajahanato citta santāne mohavāsanāya vijjamānattā sabbaññu bhāvaṃ nagacchanti.
anya-e0401n0:31_21: Tasmā yathātesaṃ kilesappahānaṃ pahānasampadā nāma nahoti.
anya-e0401n0:31_36: Idañca visuddhimagge=pahānanti koci dhammonāma natthi aññatra vuttappakārānaṃ pāṇātipātādīnaṃ anuppādamattato=ti āgatattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:31_37: Pahāyakadhammasamādānena pana pahātabba dhammānaṃ anuppādo nāma ekopaṇīta dhammohoti.
anya-e0401n0:31_46: Idha pana anuppāda sampāpakaṃ vipassanā ñāṇañca maggaññāṇañca upacārena pahānanti adhippetaṃ. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:31_51: “Sīlādiguṇehī”ti sīla samādhi paññā vimutti vimuttiññāṇadassana guṇehi.
anya-e0401n0:31_53: “Lakkhaṇānubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitassā”ti dvattiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi ca asīti khuddakalakkhaṇehi ca paṭimaṇḍitassa.
anya-e0401n0:31_58: Aparipāka gatindriyānaṃ sattānaṃ indriyaparipākakālāgamanañca ettha vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:31_62: “Sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhī”ti ettha abhisambodhisaṅkhātaṃ aggamaggaññāṇaṃ gahitaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:33_2: Yathā=sasaṅghaṃlokanāyakaṃ namassissaṃ=ti etthasahasaddassa samavāyatthattā ahaṃlokanāyakañca saṅghañca namassissanti evaṃ samavāyattho viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:33_3: Tathā idhapi sammāsambuddhañcasaddhammañca gaṇuttamañca abhivādiyāmīti evaṃ kiriyāsamavāyattho sahasaddena dīpitoti dassetuṃ “dūratohaṃ…pe…
anya-e0401n0:33_6: Ettha ca“samavāyo”ti dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bahūnaṃ vā atthānaṃ ekasmiṃ dabbevā guṇevākiriyāyavāsamaṃ avecca ayanaṃpavattanaṃ samavāyo.
anya-e0401n0:33_9: Anekajāti saṃsāraṃ sandhāvissa=ntiādinā atītepikāle anāgatavacanaṃ payujjatīti āha “namassissa”nti namassiṃti.
anya-e0401n0:33_19: tiādīsu visuṃvisuṃ padhānattā aguṇabhūtāpi dhammasaṅghā idhasamāsapade aññapadatthassaguṇabhūtāhonti.
anya-e0401n0:33_21: “Abhivāditabhāvo”ti vutte tapaccayassa bahulaṃ atītakālavisayattā pubbeganthārambhakāle dhamma saṅghānaṃpi therassa vandanāsiddhi dassitā hoti.
anya-e0401n0:33_22: “Abhivādetabba bhāvo”ti vuttepana tabbapaccayassakālasāmaññavisayattāna tathā dassitā hoti.
anya-e0401n0:33_25: Evaṃ dhammasaṅghānaṃ sabbakālaṃpi abhivādanārahaguṇo eva dassitoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:33_28: “Attano nidassanenā”ti saputtadāro āgatoti attanā nīharitvā dassitena payogena.
anya-e0401n0:33_31: Ettha ca therassa vandanāvacane thero imehi yevapadehi ratanattayaṃtīhidvāre hivandatīti gahetvā “abhivādiyā”ti
anya-e0401n0:33_33: Appadhāna kiriyāpade pana tadattha nīharaṇaṃ asambhāvento “apicā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:33_34: Tattha “apicā”ti kiñci vattabbaṃ atthīti atthajotane ayaṃ nipātasamudayo.
anya-e0401n0:34_3: ti ādayo samāsataddhitasaddā yebhūyyena atissayattha dīpakā honti.
anya-e0401n0:34_5: Tasmā idhāpi tathā rūpaṃ atissayatthaṃ dassetuṃ “attanānimmitena…pe…
anya-e0401n0:34_13: Atha kho idaṃpi padaṃ satthu paccekabuddhādīhi asādhāraṇa padamevahotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:35_8: “Nibbānena saheva hutvā”ti ārammaṇādhipatibhūtaṃ ārammaṇū panissayabhūtañca nibbānaṃ attano patiṭṭhaṃ katvāti adhippāyo. Apica,
anya-e0401n0:35_9: samucchedoti ca nissaraṇanti ca atthato samānagatikaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:35_20: Dutīyavikappe akicca paccayabhūtāpi kecikitakapaccayā kammatthegatā kiccapaccayānaṃpi atthaṃ dīpeti. Yathā, diṭṭhaṃ, sutaṃ, mutaṃ,
anya-e0401n0:35_31: Tatīya vikappe “apatamānaṃ vahantī”ti apatamānaṃ katvā vahanti.
anya-e0401n0:35_41: codakopaṭipatti dhammaṃ dasavidha dhammato aññaṃmaññamāno “kasmā”tiādinā codeti.
anya-e0401n0:35_42: So pana paṭipatti dhammo tato aññona hoti,
anya-e0401n0:35_44: “Maggassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadā hotī”ti yathā ambarukkho ambapupphaambapphalassa patiṭṭhā bhāvena pubbabhāga nissayo hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:35_45: itoyevatassa pupphapphalassa jātattā etthevasaṃ vaḍḍhitattā ca.
anya-e0401n0:35_46: Tathā paṭipatti dhammopi ariyamaggapphalassapatiṭṭhābhāvena pubbabhāgūpanissayappaṭipadāhoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:35_49: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yekeci mebījagāmabhūtagāmāvuḍḍhiṃ viruḷiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti.
anya-e0401n0:35_51: Evameva kho bhikkhave bhikkhusīlaṃ nissāya sīlepatiṭṭhāya ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgīkaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento vuḍḍhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti dhammesūti.
anya-e0401n0:35_53: dānamayaṃ puññaṃ sīlamayaṃ puññaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ puññanti vutte dānavatthu pariyesanato paṭṭhāya dānaṃ
anya-e0401n0:35_54: ārabbhapavattā sabbā pubbabhāga cetanā dānavacane saṅgahitā dānantveva saṅkhyaṃgatā.
anya-e0401n0:35_55: Evaṃ so paṭipatti dhammo ariya maggavacane evasaṅgahito,
anya-e0401n0:35_56: ariyamaggo tveva saṅkhyaṃ gatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:36_4: “Puthujjanakalyāṇako”ti ettha tividho kalyāṇako vinayakalyāṇako suttantakalyāṇako abhidhammakalyāṇakoti.
anya-e0401n0:36_5: Tattha vinaye paññattāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā samannāgato bhikkhu vinayakalyāṇako nāma.
anya-e0401n0:36_6: So idha bhikkhu pātimokkha saṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāra gocara sampanno,
anya-e0401n0:36_7: aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti ettha veditabbo.
anya-e0401n0:37_0: Suttantesu vuttāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā samannāgato gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā suttanta kalyāṇako nāma.
anya-e0401n0:37_1: So catūhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sabbaṃ duggatibhayaṃ samatikkanto hoti.
anya-e0401n0:37_3: Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti iti piso bhagavā…pe…
anya-e0401n0:37_6: Dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo…pe…
anya-e0401n0:37_8: Saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho…pe…
anya-e0401n0:37_10: Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hotīti ettha veditabbo.
anya-e0401n0:37_13: tiādikānaṃ guṇapadānaṃ attha jānanaññāṇena yutto pasādo.
anya-e0401n0:37_21: dhammānu dhammappaṭipattītiādīni bahūni suttantāni idha vattabbāni.
anya-e0401n0:38_0: Abhidhamme vā suttantesu vā vuttāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā samannāgatogahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā abhidhammakalyāṇako nāma.
anya-e0401n0:38_1: So idha sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṃ dassāvī ariya dhammassakovido ariyadhammesu vinīto.
anya-e0401n0:38_2: So rūpaṃ attato na samanupassatīti ettha veditabbo. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:38_6: dīsu uggaha paripucchā vinicchayaññāṇa samannāgato gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā suta vā nāmāti aṭṭhakathāsu vutto.
anya-e0401n0:38_7: So eva puthujjana kalyāṇakoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:40_0: Andho puthujjano eko, kalyāṇeko puthujjano. ti
anya-e0401n0:41_1: Aṅguttare pana catukkanipāte katamo puggalo appassuto sutena upapanno hoti.
anya-e0401n0:41_2: Idhekacco dhammaṃ suṇāti ekāyapi cātuppadikāya gāthāya attha maññāya dhamma maññāya dhammā nu dhammappaṭipanno hoti.
anya-e0401n0:41_4: Sutavāti ca sutena upapannoti ca atthato ekanti.
anya-e0401n0:41_7: Puthujjana kalyāṇakena saddhiṃ satta ariyapuggalā sikkhanti.
anya-e0401n0:41_10: Ti saraṇa saraṇaṃ gato upāsakopi sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne saṅgahitoti vuttaṃ. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:41_16: evarūpesu ṭhānesu āgate saṅgha vacane asaṅgahito.
anya-e0401n0:41_17: “Na hitaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantassasaraṇagamanaṃ sampajjatī”ti idaṃ saṅghaṃsaraṇaṃ gacchāmīti ettha saṅgha
anya-e0401n0:41_20: Sace pana sabbaṃ bhagavato sāvakasaṅghaṃ anuddhissatameva puggalaṃ saṅghaṃsaraṇaṃ gaccheyya āyasmantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti.
anya-e0401n0:41_22: Atha sabbaṃ bhagavato sāvakasaṅghaṃ uddissa tassa santike saraṇaṃ gaccheyya saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti.
anya-e0401n0:41_24: Idañca daharakāle sabbappathamaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:41_25: Idañhi saraṇa gamanaṃ nāma sakiṃ gahetvā ratanattaye saddhaṃ ajahantassa yāvajīvaṃpi na bhijjati.
anya-e0401n0:41_29: Sabbappathamaṃ gahaṇakāle ca aññena dinnattā laddhaṃ nahoti.
anya-e0401n0:41_31: Tasmā aññassa santike aggahetvā sayameva vacībhedaṃ gaṇhantassa gahaṭṭhassa saraṇa gamanaṃ sampajjatiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:41_34: Tañca kho ubhinnaṃpiṭhānakaraṇa sampattiyā sati evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:41_43: Visesato pana vinayappaṭipatti eva idha pariyattāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0401n0:41_48: “Anekesu suttasahassesū”ti vinayepi bahūni garahasuttapadāni dissanti suttantesupi.
anya-e0401n0:42_1: Kilesesamenti vūpasamentīti santoti vacanatthaṃ sandhāya “samitakilesāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:42_13: “Tathā dhārentassā”ti ayaṃ me hitoti dhārentassa hitoyevasampajjati,
anya-e0401n0:43_1: Etena samānadiṭṭhisīlā janā gaṇīyanti etthāti gaṇo.
anya-e0401n0:43_2: Saṃhanīyanti ekatokarīyanti etthāti saṅghoti imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0401n0:43_8: Tathāgatassa sāvakasaṅgho tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatīti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:43_9: Soyeva idha gaṇuttamoti vuccati visesana para nipāta vasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:43_20: Dakkhiṇā vuccati kammañca kammaphalañca saddahitvā āyatiṃ vipākapphalappaṭi lābhatthāya dinnaṃ dānakammaṃ dakkhanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etāyāti katvā.
anya-e0401n0:43_22: “Arahatī”ti ca anuttara puññakkhetta visesattādāyakena icchita patthitassa āyatiṃ phalassa suṭṭhusampādanavasena
anya-e0401n0:43_23: dāyakassa ca avirādhanato asaṅkhyeyyāppameyyavaḍḍhi āvahanato ca paṭiggaṇhituṃ arahati.
anya-e0401n0:43_26: Tesaṃ khetta duṭṭhattā dāyakena icchitapatthitaṃ phalaṃ na sampādeti.
anya-e0401n0:43_31: Sayañca taṃdānaṃ paṭiggahaṇato vā paribhogato vā saddhādeyyaṃ vinipātanato vā duggati bhāgino honti.
anya-e0401n0:43_33: “Upasampadākammaṃ sammuti nāmā”ti ekena pariyāyena sammuti kammaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:43_35: Ñatti catuttha kammavācā saṅkhātāya pana saṅghasammutiyā siddhattā tena pariyāyena sammuti kammanti vuccatīti.
anya-e0401n0:43_37: Tathā hi vuttaṃ vinaye bhikkhu vibhaṅge.
anya-e0401n0:43_38: Ñatti catutthena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahenāti. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:43_39: “ṭhānārahenā”ti upasampanna bhūmisaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ pāpetuṃ arahenāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:43_44: devasaṅghāsamāgatātiādīsu viya bahūnaṃ samūhanaṭṭhena lokasammutiyā siddhosaṅgho sammuti saṅghotipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:43_45: “Ariyapuggalasamūho”ti puthujjanakalyāṇako bhikkhu pubbe vuttanayena sotāpatti maggaṭṭhe saṅgahitoti,
anya-e0401n0:43_47: “Sammuti saṅghe antogadhoyevā”ti etena dakkhiṇeyyasaṅgho nāma visuṃ navattabbo.
anya-e0401n0:43_50: Bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho tveva vattabbaṃ hotīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:43_52: Idha pana saṅghavacanena āgataṭṭhānassa duvidhattā saṅghassa duvidhatā vuttā.
anya-e0401n0:43_53: Tattha sammuti saṅghassa āgataṭṭhānaṃ vinayakammesūti vuttameva.
anya-e0401n0:43_57: Dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṭṭhāne pana puggalikadānesu catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato upāsakopi sāmaṇeropi yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:43_66: “Puthujjana saṅgho”ti idaṃ ariya saṅghena vinākevalaṃ puthujjanasaṅghaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:43_67: Ettha ca saṅgha vacanena saṅgha pariyāpanno ekopi bhikkhu gahetabbo.
anya-e0401n0:44_0: Dakkhiṇavibhaṅgasutte saṅghikadāne bhavissanti kho panānanda gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā.
anya-e0401n0:44_2: Tadāpānanda saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ appameyyanti vadāmīti vuttattā saṅghikaṭṭhānaṃ patvā koci
anya-e0401n0:44_3: bhikkhu dakkhiṇeyya saṅghe asaṅgahitoti natthīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0401n0:45_0: Khettaṃ dūsentīti khettaduṭṭhāni. Tiṇāni. Khettaduṭṭhā kilesā. Vuttañhidhammapade.
anya-e0401n0:52_0: Idha pana sātissayato khettaduṭṭhe kilese dassetuṃ “sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchānusayāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:54_3: Vandantohi vandaneyye vuddhe tathā vadāpeti nāma.
anya-e0401n0:54_13: Tathāhi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti karaṇavasena cakkhūti laddhavohārena rūpadassana samatthena cakkhu viññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā.
anya-e0401n0:54_14: Porāṇā panāhu cakkhu rūpaṃ na passati,
anya-e0401n0:54_18: Dvārārammaṇa saṅghaṭṭane pana sati cakkhu pasādavatthu kenacittena passati.
anya-e0401n0:54_19: Īdisī panesā kathā dhanunā vijjhatītiādīsu viya sasambhāra kathānāma hoti.
anya-e0401n0:54_20: Tasmā cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti cakkhu viññāṇena rūpaṃ disvāti ayamevettha atthoti.
anya-e0401n0:54_21: Etthahi “kāyenā”ti kāya viññattisaṅkhātaṃ dvāra rūpaṃ karaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:54_22: Tasmā cakkhunāti vacane upacāra vacane sati kāyenāti vacanaṃpi upacāra vacananti viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:54_23: Tathā cakkhunāti pade cakkhuviññāṇenāti atthe sati kāyenāti padepi kāyakammenāti attho viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:54_30: tīhi kammehi vandāmīti idameva mukhyavacananti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:54_31: Sabbamidaṃ indriya saṃvarasīlaṭṭhāne aṭṭhakathāsu āgatattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:54_32: Cakkhunāti idaṃ pana mukhya karaṇa vacanameva sambhavati. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:55_1: vācāyavandatī,ti ettha taṃkāyavacīviññatti rūpa dvayaṃ kiñcāpi sahajāta cetanā kammena jātaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:55_3: Evaṃ santepi taṃ rūpa dvayaṃ tassācetanāya kāyavandanākamma,
anya-e0401n0:55_5: Yathātaṃ mātito jāto putto vuddhi patto taṃ taṃ kammesu mātuyā bala vūpanissayo hoti.
anya-e0401n0:55_6: Evañca katvā taṃ rūpadvayaṃ abhidhamme dvārarūpanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:55_8: vācāyā,ti idaṃpi mukhya karaṇa vacanamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:55_10: tassakammassa vandanākiriyāya saha abhedo āpajjatīti ce.
anya-e0401n0:55_14: manasāti imasmiṃ sutte yathāhi “cetayitvā”ti purimacetanāhi ceta yitvā.
anya-e0401n0:55_15: “Kammaṃ karotī”ti pacchimaṃ sanniṭṭhāpana cetanā kammaṃ karotīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:57_8: tayomebhikkhave puggalātiādinā paññattivohārena pavattāpi desanā paramattha dhammehi vinā napavattati.
anya-e0401n0:57_19: suddha dhammādhiṭṭhāna desanā pavattivasena visesatā yojetabbā.
anya-e0401n0:57_22: Kasmā devesu eva desentīti āha “na hi manussā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n0:57_23: Tattha “na hi manussā paṭiggahetuṃ sakkontī”ti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:57_26: “Ekamātikānu bandhā”ti kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammātiādikaṃ ekaṃ abhidhamma mātikaṃ anugatā.
anya-e0401n0:57_32: ti vatvā tadatthaṃ vitthārento suttañhi patvā pañcakkhandhā ekadeseneva vibhattā,
anya-e0401n0:57_37: “Dhammo panā”ti pāḷidvayamāha.“Evaṃ santepī”ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ evaṃ vicāritepisati.
anya-e0401n0:57_42: Lokasmiṃ kenaci samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā paṭinivattituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ āṇāvidhānaṃ āṇācakkaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:57_43: Tathā asakkuṇeyyaṃ desanā vidhānaṃ dhammacakkaṃ nāma. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:57_44: yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati,
anya-e0401n0:57_46: tiādinā nayena pavattaṃ āṇāvidhānaṃ āṇācakkaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:57_49: Tadubhayaṃpi koci bhindituṃ pārājikaṃ vā bhikkhuṃ apārājikaṃ kātuṃ catussaccaṃ vā dhammaṃ asaccaṃ kātuṃ nasakkoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_50: Atha kho karontoyeva devadattoviya āpāyiko hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_51: Pārājikoca bhikkhu attānaṃ suddhaṃ akaronto apāyagāmīyeva hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_53: Evaṃ kenaci paṭinivattituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā tadubhayaṃpi appaṭivattiyaṃ cakkaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_54: “Vinayo nāma sāsanassa mūla”nti vinaye ṭhite bhikkhusaṅgho paññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:57_58: Kathañcapariyattisaddhamme paññāyante tividhaṃpi sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhatīti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n0:57_61: Micchāvādinopanavadanti vinaye cūḷavaggebhikkhunikkhandhake sace ānanda mamasāsanemātugāmo pabbajjaṃ nalabheyya.
anya-e0401n0:57_63: Idāni mātugāmassa pabbajjā anuññātā gotamiyā punappunaṃ āyācanaṃ upādāya.
anya-e0401n0:57_71: So ca ādīnavo aṭṭhagarudhamme saṇṭhapetvā satthārā eva paṭibāhito.
anya-e0401n0:57_79: Idaṃpi tesaṃ atthañcakāraṇañca adisvā ajānitvā vuttattā micchā vacanamattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_81: “Vassasahassaṃ saddhammo tiṭṭheyyā”ti vassasahassameva saddhammo aparihāyamāno tiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0401n0:57_97: Sesāni cattārivassasahassāni anukkamena sesānaṃ catunnaṃ saṅghānaṃ khettāni jātāni.
anya-e0401n0:57_98: Evaṃ tatoparaṃ parihāyamāno gacchatīti ayamettha attho.
anya-e0401n0:57_103: So eva tividhaṃ sāsananti ca vuccati. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:57_107: Bhikkhū ca pariyattikammikā aneka satasahassamattā paññāyanti.
anya-e0401n0:57_108: Kathañcidaṃ sāsanaṃ tatoparaṃ ekadivasaṃpi na tiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0401n0:57_109: Te ca bhikkhū sīlappaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitā aneka satasahassamattā etarahi sandhissanti.
anya-e0401n0:57_110: Kathañca paṭipatti sāsanaṃ tatoparaṃ na tiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0401n0:57_111: Pariyattiyāca paṭipattiyāca tiṭṭhamānāyapaṭivedhasaddhammopi na tiṭṭhatīti na vattabbo. Yathāhi-
anya-e0401n0:57_113: So puttadhītu paramparānaṃ atthāya mahantāratananidhayo bhūmiyaṃ bahūsuṭṭhānesu nidahitvā ṭhapitā honti.
anya-e0401n0:57_114: Potthakesu ca tesaṃ pavattiṃ paripuṇṇaṃ likhitvā ṭhapeti.
anya-e0401n0:57_115: Tattha nimīsu ca potthakesu ca akkharesu ca dharantesu tenidhayo nassanti antaradhāyantīti na vattabbāyeva.
anya-e0401n0:57_119: Yathā ca seṭṭhivaṃsejāto balasampanno puriso potthakaṃ passitvā suṭṭhu khaṇanto tāniratanāni labhissatiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:57_120: Evamidhapi balasampanno bhikkhu desanādhammaṃ sutvā suṭṭhu paṭipajjanto tānidhammaratanāni labhissatiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:57_123: Sīmānañca pavattivānivatti vā āṇācakkasseva visayo hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_130: Baddhasīmāyo ca nivattamānā dvīhi kāraṇehi nivattanti antaradhāyanti.
anya-e0401n0:57_134: Sāsanantaradhānañca nāma anāgate dhātuparinibbānena paricchinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_135: Dhātuparinibbānehi jāte sabbaṃ āṇācakkaṃ vigataṃ hoti,
anya-e0401n0:57_137: Dhammacakkaṃ pana devalokesu yāvānāgatabuddhakālāpi pavattissatiyeva āḷavakapucchāgāthāyo viya.
anya-e0401n0:57_138: Apicayo vo ānanda mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto.
anya-e0401n0:57_141: Socati piṭakabhūto dhammavinayo satthā etarahi tividhaṃpi sāsanaṃ lokassa dīpento pakāsento tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n0:57_142: Yatobuddhabhāsikānaṃ devamanussānaṃ nānā bāhirakehi janehi asādhāraṇo mahanto ñāṇāloko etarahi vijjotamāno pavattati.
anya-e0401n0:57_143: Tehi sabbaññutaññāṇena desitāni etarahidharamānāni caturāsīti dhammakkhandha sahassāni sutvā anamataggesaṃsāre
anya-e0401n0:57_147: Āyatiñca saggatthāya ca maggaphalanibbānatthāya ca nānāpuññakiriyavatthūni ārabhanti,
anya-e0401n0:57_155: Imāya ca paṭipattiyā āyatiṃ saggamaggaphala nibbānappaṭilābhāya saṃvattanikattāti.
anya-e0401n0:57_156: Ettāvatā sabbaṃ micchāvādīnaṃ micchāvacanaṃ vidhamitaṃviddhaṃsitaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0401n0:59_9: Evaṃtīsu atthavikappesu pathamassa kālavirodhaṃ dassetvā idāni dutīya tatīyānaṃ saddatovirodhaṃ vattuṃ “nacā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:59_10: Tattha “ādimhi yevā”ti etena yadākadāci paccāmasanaṃ appadhānanti dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:59_11: “Appadhānapadānī”ti abhidhammatthasaṅgahanti imasmiṃ ekasmiṃ samāsapade purimāni visesana padāni.
anya-e0401n0:59_13: tasmiṃ abhidhammatthasaṅgahappakaraṇe tasmiṃ abhidhammattha padevā sabbathā mayā vuttāti attho hoti.
anya-e0401n0:59_15: Tasmiṃ abhidhamme buddhena bhagavatā sabbathā vuttāti attho yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:59_18: “evañhisatī”ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ viya idha abhidhammatthasaṅgahapadaṃ paccāmasante sati.
anya-e0401n0:59_21: “Paṭikkhittā hoti” tasmiṃ abhidhammatthasaṅgahapade mayā sabbathā vuttāti atthassa sambhavato.
anya-e0401n0:59_22: Na kevalaṃ so eva doso āpajjati.
anya-e0401n0:60_2: Visesanapadaṃ nāma katthaci bhūtakathanatthāyavā payujjati kaṇhokāko,
anya-e0401n0:60_8: Paññāpanañca nāma samaggānaṃ janānaṃ vohārena ca sampaṭicchanena cāti dvīhi aṅgehi sijjhatīti āha “tecamahājanā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n0:60_13: Sāhi musāvādādīhi vacīduccaritehi viramaṇamattena vacīsaccanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:60_25: “Evaṃ mahantaṃ sammuti sacca”nti etena ahaṃ paramattha saccamevagaṇhāmīti sammuti saccaṃ nabhinditabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:60_30: Bhavanibbattakaṃ kusalākusalakammaṃ nāma natthīti gaṇhanto ucchedadiṭṭhiyaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n0:60_33: “Vijjamānantveva gaṇhāpetī”ti saññā cittadiṭṭhi vipallāsānaṃ vatthubhāvena gaṇhāpeti.
anya-e0401n0:60_35: “Evaṃ viparītañhi sammutisacca”nti etenasammuti saccamevadaḷhaṃ gahetvā paramattha saccaṃ nabhinditabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:60_38: Khandhe vā khandhamuttakevā attajīve gahetvā teca attajīvā parammaraṇā ucchijjantīti gaṇhanto ucchedadiṭṭhiyaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n0:60_39: Te ca attajīvā bhavābhavesusassatā hutvā bhavatobhavaṃ saṃsaranti sandhāvantīti gaṇhantosassatadiṭṭhiyaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n0:60_43: Sabbākārato sukhabhūtattā vedanā sukhāti vuttā nahoti.
anya-e0401n0:60_53: “Kusalasammatā”ti etena sabhāvasaccepi etevohārā lokasammuti nissitāti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n0:60_56: Oghehi ca yogehi ca upādānehi ca pattabbabhāvo “oghanīyayoganīya upādānīyatā”.
anya-e0401n0:60_60: Sattasantānapariyāpannā pana rūpārūpadhammā taṇhāpariggaha daḷhaṭṭhena tato bahiddhā attato adhikā attāti atthena ajjhattāti lokasammuti hoti.
anya-e0401n0:60_63: iti idaṃ catukkaṃ ariyasaccaṃ nāmāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:60_66: Tebhūmaka dhammānaṃ sukhatā nāma calā hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:60_68: Te dhammesukhāti gahetvā attano ajjhattaṅgaṃ karontā acireneva dukkhaṃ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0401n0:60_69: Te dhamme dukkhāti ñatvā tehivimuttā puna dukkhaṃ pāpuṇantīti natthi.
anya-e0401n0:60_73: “Yo vinā aññāpadesenā”ti ettha aññāpadeso nāma aṭṭhadhamma samodhānaṃ nissāya ghaṭasaṇṭhānaṃ paññāyati,
anya-e0401n0:60_75: taṃ saṇṭhānaṃ attano sabhāvena vinā aññāpadesena siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:60_83: “Cittenaparikappetvā”ti manoviññāṇa cittena avijjamānaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ vijjamānaṃ katvā.
anya-e0401n0:60_86: “Cittamayocittanimmito”ti supinante diṭṭharūpāni viya cittenapakato cittena nimmito.
anya-e0401n0:60_88: “Santī”ti etena asadhātu vasena atthoti siddhaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:60_95: imasmiṃ buddhasāsane pañcasāsana kiccāni mahantāni abhiññeyyānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhijānanaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:60_100: Tattha sabbepi paramattha dhammā abhiññeyyā nāma.
anya-e0401n0:60_105: Tesu dhammesu tesaṃ kiccānaṃ siddhiyā imasmiṃ sāsane sāsanakiccaṃ siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:60_107: Te ca dhammā eva rūpānaṃ sāsana kiccānaṃ avirādhakattā avisaṃvādakattā uttamaṭṭhena paramatthā nāma hontīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:61_5: Tattha catusacca dhammā nāma paramattha dhammā eva.
anya-e0401n0:61_6: Pañcañeyyadhammā pana sabba paññattiyā saha sabbaparamattha dhammā.
anya-e0401n0:61_7: Sabbaññubuddhānaṃ catusaccābhi sambodho dhamma paññattiyā saha sijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:61_8: Paccekabuddhānaṃ catusacca sambodho dhammapaññattiyā saha nasijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:61_9: Tasmā te sayaṃ paṭividdhaṃ catusacca dhammaṃ nāma paññattiṃ nīharitvā paresaṃ desetuṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e0401n0:61_10: Tesaṃ catusaccasambodho mūgassa supinadassanaṃ viya hotīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:61_11: Tasmā paññattiyā saha pañca ñeyya dhammā eva sabbaññutaññāṇassa gocarāti sakkāvattunti.
anya-e0401n0:63_4: ārammaṇaṃ cintetīti evaṃ ārammaṇabhūtena kammapadena vinā asambhavato.
anya-e0401n0:63_6: tasmā assa nāmaṃ siddhanti daṭṭhabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:63_9: nti ettha ārammaṇassa bhūtasabhāva cintāpi atthi,
anya-e0401n0:63_11: ṇūpaladdhiyevā”ti vuttaṃ. Cittaṃ, mano, mānasaṃ, viññāṇa,
anya-e0401n0:63_16: Evarūpassa ārammaṇa vijānana saṅkhātassa atthantarassabodhakaṃ nahotīti dassetuṃ “santesu cā”tiādivuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:63_17: “Etenā”ti idaṃ kattuno kiriyāsādhane atissayūpakārakaṃ karaṇa sādhanaṃ vadatīti dassetuṃ “tañhī”tiādivuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:63_27: “Ekaṃ bhāvasādhanameva padhānato labbhatī”ti idaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃ taṃ kiriyā mattabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:63_28: Kiriyāmattabhūtāpi pana te dhammāsayaṃ nānāpaccayā vatthāyaṃ ṭhitā vā honti nānāpaccayuppannāvatthāyaṃ ṭhitā vā.
anya-e0401n0:63_29: Tasmā paramattha padesupi yathārahaṃ tadaññasādhanānaṃ paṭilābho avārito hoti.
anya-e0401n0:63_35: “Abhedassa cintanassabhedakaraṇa”nti idaṃ cintetīti cittantikataṃ kattusādhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:63_37: Tassa sarīraṃ nāma visuṃ aṅgaṃ natthi.
anya-e0401n0:63_49: Na pana attādiko kattā nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n0:63_50: Tasmā kiriyā mattameva kattāraṃ katvā “cintetīti citta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:63_52: Idaṃ abhedassabheda parikappanāya payojananti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:63_53: “Attappadhāno”ti kiriyāsādhane bahūnaṃkārakānaṃ majjhe sayaṃpadhāno sayaṃjeṭṭhako hutvā.
anya-e0401n0:63_56: Evaṃ cittassa vacanatthaṃ dassetvā idāni tassa abhidhānatthaṃ dassento “apicetthā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:63_57: Yathayidaṃ ye ime tiracchānagatā pāṇā cittāvicittā.
anya-e0401n0:63_58: Evaṃ cittaṃ vicittaṃ yaṃ aññaṃ atthi,
anya-e0401n0:63_62: Etena tato caraṇato cittatoti atthaṃ vadati. Gāthāyaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:63_66: taṃ kiccaṃ katvā laddho sampattiguṇo ca.
anya-e0401n0:63_69: “Gayhākāro”ti ñāṇena gahetabbo tassa tassa dhammassa dhajabhūto ākāro.
anya-e0401n0:65_14: “Cittakiriyā bhūtā evā”ti ārammaṇaṃ vijānantaṃ cittaṃ phusanākāraṃ janetvāva vijānāti.
anya-e0401n0:65_16: Avasesā pana sabbepi cetasikadhammā phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjanti.
anya-e0401n0:65_17: Phasso hetu phasso paccayo vedanākkhandhassa upādāya.
anya-e0401n0:65_20: Evaṃ santepi cittamūlakattā cittanissitattā ca tepidhammā cittakiri yābhūtā eva hontīti.
anya-e0401n0:65_23: Paripuṇṇāni ce tasikaṅgāni upari therena sayameva vakkhamānattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:65_24: Idha pana padatthavibhāvanaṭṭhānattā paripuṇṇehi aṅgehi vibhāvetuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha “taṃ nasundara”nti.
anya-e0401n0:65_28: kusalanti vā akusalanti vā vattabbaṃ natthi.
anya-e0401n0:65_29: Nānācetasike hi yuttattā eva tathā vattabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:67_5: “kenaruppatī”ti ettha “kenā”ti hetu atthevā hetu kattarivā karaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:67_7: Ḍaṃsamakasā nāma sūcimukhā khuddakamakkhikāceva mahanta makkhikā ca.
anya-e0401n0:67_17: Idāni pāḷiyā saddhiṃ mukhyaruppanaṃ saṃsandento “samāgamo cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:67_18: Samāgamo ca nāma aññamaññābhighaṭṭanaṃ vuccatīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:67_20: “Mahābhūtānameva vā”ti āpodhātu vajjitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānameva vā.
anya-e0401n0:67_22: “Sayaṃpi vikārapattā hontī”ti temahābhūtāsayaṃpi pakatiṃ vijahitvā omattādhimattabhāvaṃ pāpuṇantīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:67_24: Evaṃ pāḷinayena vipattivasena ruppanaṃ vatvā idāni vipatti vā hotu,
anya-e0401n0:67_26: Purimapacchi masantatīnaṃ visadisappavattibhūto vikāropi ekena pariyāyena ruppanaṃnāmāti katvā puna taṃ ruppanaṃ dassento “apicetthā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:67_27: “Ghaṭṭanavasena ruppana dhammāna mevā”ti āpātāgamanādivasena ruppanadhammehivinā abhighaṭṭanavasenaruppana
anya-e0401n0:67_35: Ekasmiñca sattasantāne ekakkhaṇe eka kalāpova pavattati. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:67_38: Rūpadhammā pana oḷārika sabhāvā ca honti.
anya-e0401n0:68_1: uṇhenapi ruppatītiādinā lokassa paccakkhato pākaṭassa sītādivacanassasāmatthiyena.
anya-e0401n0:68_2: Tañhi vacanaṃ lokassa apākaṭaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ ruppanaṃ idhanādhippetanti dīpetīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:68_7: Evaṃ santepi pāḷisādhakaṃ nāma na sakkāsabbattha laddhuṃ.
anya-e0401n0:68_13: “Anuggahānaṃ sītādīnaṃ vasenā”ti kiñcāpipāḷiyaṃ sītādivacanaṃ upaghātakānaṃ sītādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:68_17: “Pāḷiyaṃ niddiṭṭhānī”ti sañjānātīti kho bhikkhave tasmā saññāti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:68_22: vijānātīti kho bhikkhave tasmā viññāṇanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:70_7: avassaṃ uppajjamānā anāgatadhammā ca anāgate pīḷessanti,
anya-e0401n0:70_11: Visayādhāro nāmamanussābhūmiyaṃ gacchantītiādīsu viya mukhyādhāro nahoti.
anya-e0401n0:70_12: Tena pana vinā aññattha taṃ kiriyaṃ kātuṃ nasakkoti.
anya-e0401n0:70_14: Yathā sakuṇānaṃ pakkhana kiriyā nāma ākāsena vinā aññattha nasijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:70_15: Tathā vaṭṭadukkhadhammānaṃ nibbuti kiriyāpi nibbānena vinā aññattha nasijjhatīti dassetuṃ “yehite”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:70_21: Tasmā nibbānaṃ tesaṃ nibbuti kiriyāya visayā dhārohotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:70_24: “Taṃ taṃ kilesānaṃ vā”ti te saṃtesaṃkilesānaṃ vā.
anya-e0401n0:70_26: “Punaappaṭisandhikabhāva”nti santānassa puna paṭisandhānābhāvaṃ pāpuṇanti ariyā janā.
anya-e0401n0:70_27: Yathā magge karaṇavacanaṃ dissati addhā imāyapaṭipattiyā jarāmaraṇamhā parimuccissāmītiādīsu.
anya-e0401n0:70_31: Tasmā nibbāne karaṇa vacanaṃ na dissati,
anya-e0401n0:70_32: karaṇa lakkhaṇasseva abhāvatoti dassetuṃ “na ca nibbāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:70_34: Nanu anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā nibbāyantīti dissatīti. Saccaṃ,
anya-e0401n0:73_6: “Bhavanikanti nāma hotī”ti bhavasaṅkhātaṃ attano khandhaṃ etaṃ mama,
anya-e0401n0:73_8: esome attāti gaṇhantī taṇhā bhavanikanti nāma.
anya-e0401n0:73_15: “Tīsubhavesu uppannānipī”ti kāmarūpārūpasattasantānesu uppannānipi na tatrapariyā pannāneva honti.
anya-e0401n0:73_20: lokuttara dhammā na hontīti evaṃ vattabbatāpatti dosoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:73_22: Avacarasaddassa uppannatthe gahitepi etedosā nāpajjanti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:73_23: loke yebhūyyanayatabbahulanayānaṃpi sabbhāvāti imamatthaṃ vadanto “nanuyebhūyya vuttivasenapī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:73_24: Tattha “kesañcī”ti kesañci puggalānaṃ vā dhammānaṃ vā.
anya-e0401n0:73_25: Yathāmigaluddako gāme carantopi vane caraṇabahulattā vanacarakoti nāmaṃ labhati.
anya-e0401n0:73_26: Rājahatthī aññattha carantopi saṅgāme caraṇabahulattā saṅgāmāvacaroti nāmaṃ labhati.
anya-e0401n0:73_30: Ambarukkhabahulattā pana taṃ vanaṃ ambavananti nāmaṃ labhati.
anya-e0401n0:73_33: Idha pana bhūmiyo tabbahulanayena kāmarūpārūpa nāmaṃ labhanti,
anya-e0401n0:73_36: te dosānā pajjantīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “tasmā idhapi…pe…
anya-e0401n0:73_42: “Pariggāhiniyā kāmataṇhāya kato”ti tathā pariggāhiniyā kāmataṇhāya gocaravisayattātāyataṇhāya katonāma hoti.
anya-e0401n0:73_47: Kāma taṇhāya gocaravisayattā kāmāvacaranti ayamatthopi sijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:74_5: “Avacaratī”ti tattha pariyāpannabhāvena pavattatīti imamatthaṃ vadati “rūpārūpāvacaresupi ayaṃnayo netabbo”ti.
anya-e0401n0:74_11: Arūpassa avacaraṃ arūpāvacaranti imamatthaṃ dīpeti “tesu panā”tiādinā.
anya-e0401n0:74_15: Rūparāgo arūparāgoti pana visuṃ vibhattattā idha kāmasaddena taṃ daññolobho gayhati.
anya-e0401n0:75_1: “Rūpārūpasaddā tāsu bhūmīsu niruḷhā”ti animittā hutvā niruḷhāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:75_7: “Yaṃ etasmiṃ antare”ti ye etasmiṃ antare khandhadhātu āyatanā.
anya-e0401n0:76_10: Nibbānaṃ pana idha na labbhati cittasaṅgahādhikārattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:78_2: “Sabbahīna”nti lobhādīhi pāpadhammehi yuttattā sabba cittehi hīnataraṃ.
anya-e0401n0:78_7: esome attāti evaṃ pavattassa bhavanikanti javanavīthicittassa vasena.
anya-e0401n0:78_9: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ lobhamūlacittassapathamaṃ vacaneti āha “akusalesu panā”tiādiṃ.“Dvīhivaṭṭamūlehī”ti lobhamohasaṅkhātehi dvīhi vaṭṭamūlehi.
anya-e0401n0:79_2: Sumanassabhāvoti vutte kāyikasukhavedanāyapi pasaṅgo siyāti vuttaṃ “mānasika…pe… nāma”nti.
anya-e0401n0:79_5: Kathaṃ pana bhāvo pavattinimittaṃ nāmahotīti āha “bhavanti…pe… katvā”ti.
anya-e0401n0:79_17: Etenāti ca etasmāti ca hetu atthe ubhayavacananti vadanti.
anya-e0401n0:79_20: pakatipaccayena anipphannaṃ kammaṃ attano balena nipphādetīti saṅkhāro.
anya-e0401n0:79_29: “Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kamme payojetītikatvā idha saṅkhāro nāmā”ti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:79_34: “Yo pana tenasahito”tiādinā pubbevuttamevatthaṃ pakārantarenapākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “sopana yadā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:79_37: Uppannatthe ikapaccayoti kathaṃ viññāyatīti āha “yasmiṃ samaye”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n0:80_2: “Na pana te bhedavantā hontī”ti kasmā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:80_12: Te pana bhedā imaṃ cittaṃ bhinnaṃ na karonti.
anya-e0401n0:80_14: Na ca tesaṃ ayaṃ vikappo atthīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:81_2: Somanassuppattiyā kāraṇe vutte taṃ sahagata cittuppattiyāpikāraṇaṃ siddhaṃ hotīti katvā tameva vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:82_0: “Imesaṃ pana cittānaṃ uppattividhānaṃ visuddhimaggegahetabba”nti visuddhi maggekhandha niddesato gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:82_2: Yadā hinatthikāmesu ādīnavotiādinānayena micchādiṭṭhiṃ purekkhitvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho kāmevā paribhuñjati,
anya-e0401n0:82_3: diṭṭhamaṅgalādīni vā sāratopacceti sabhāva tikkhena anussāhitenacittena.
anya-e0401n0:82_7: Yadā micchā diṭṭhiṃ apurekkhitvā kevalaṃ haṭṭhatuṭṭho methunaṃ vā sevati,
anya-e0401n0:82_9: parabhaṇḍaṃ vā harati sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena cittena.
anya-e0401n0:82_13: Yadā pana kāmānaṃ vā asampattiṃ āgamma aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvena catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitāhonti,
anya-e0401n0:84_3: Dummanassa bhāvoti vutte kāyikadukkhavedanāyapi pasaṅgo siyāti vuttaṃ “mānasika…pe… nāma”nti.
anya-e0401n0:85_7: Evaṃ sahagatappasaṅgaṃ nivattetvā sampayuttappasaṅgaṃ nivattetuṃ “paṭighaggahaṇaṃpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:85_9: Ādikappato paṭṭhāya manussānaṃ yathākāma paribhogatthāya lokissariyenathāvaraṭṭhāyinā nimmitattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:85_14: Purimacittassalobhasahagatabhāvo imāniaṭṭhapi lobhasahagatacittānināmāti iminā cūḷanigamane neva siddhoviyāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:85_15: Cūḷanigamanena paṭighasampayutta bhāvesiddhe domanassasahagatabhāvopi tenasiddho yevāti katvā “tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:85_17: Imasmiṃ citte issāmacchariyakukkuccānicathinamiddhāni ca aniyatayogīni ca honti yevāpanakāni ca.
anya-e0401n0:85_23: “Yathātaṃ”ti taṃ nidassanaṃ tadudāharaṇaṃ yathā katamanti attho.
anya-e0401n0:85_29: So ātapattaṃ laddhoti vutte sabbaṃ rājasampattiṃ laddhoti viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:85_30: Tasmā idaṃ upalakkhaṇa vacanaṃ jātanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:85_32: Pubbe domanassasahagatanti vatvā nigamane paṭighasampayuttacittānīti vuttattā “imassa…pe…
anya-e0401n0:86_3: “Taṃ kutettha labbhā”ti ahaṃ alābhādīhi māsamāgacchīti patthentassapi kutomeetthaloketaṃ patthanā pūraṇaṃ sabbakālaṃ labbhāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:86_5: Imesaṃ uppattividhānaṃ visuddhimagge saṅkhepatova vuttaṃ tassa pāṇāti pātādīsu tikkhamandappavattikāle pavattiveditabbāti.
anya-e0401n0:88_5: aññathānu khoti evaṃ dvidhā erayati kampatīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:88_8: Idañhi paṭighasampayuttaṃ viya nigamanena siddhaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0401n0:88_9: “Idha laddhokāsaṃ hutvā”ti mūlantara virahattā eva idhaladdhokāsaṃ hutvā.
anya-e0401n0:88_18: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ saṅkhāra bhedena avijjāya duvidhabhāvova vutto.
anya-e0401n0:88_20: Avijjā appaṭipatti micchā paṭipattito duvidhā tathā sasaṅkhā rāsaṅkhāratoti vutto.
anya-e0401n0:88_22: Imesaṃ dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ uppattividhānaṃ visuddhimaggesaṅkhepatovavuttaṃ tassaasanniṭṭhānavikkhepakālepavatti veditabbāti.
anya-e0401n0:89_9: “Niyāmaṃ okkamantāpī”ti pañcānantariya kammabhāvena niyatamicchādiṭṭhibhāvena ca niyāmaṃ okkamantāpi.
anya-e0401n0:89_16: “Siyu”nti padaṃ dhātupaccayehi siddhaṃ nipphannapadaṃ nāma nahoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:92_10: Ettha ca viññāṇāni ekavatthu nissitāni honti.
anya-e0401n0:92_18: Takkiriyāti ca sukhakiriyā dukkha kiriyāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:92_20: Ca saddo okāsatthoti katvā “dukkaraṃ okāsadāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:93_7: Tasmā āloko tesaṃ visayavisayībhāvūpagamane sannissayo hoti.
anya-e0401n0:93_10: Imesaṃ aṅgānaṃ yutti dīpanā uparirūpasaṅgahe āgamissati.
anya-e0401n0:93_12: Tattha “tasmiṃ pana āpātaṃ āgacchantepi ālokasannissaye asati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nuppajjatī”ti vacanaṃ asambhāvento “taṃ vinā ālokenā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:94_4: Pubbe katakammaṃ idāni nibbattiṃ pāpuṇātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:94_7: Idha panasā cetanā samaṅgitāya saṅgahitāti katvā “catasso samaṅgithā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:94_9: “Taṃ taṃ kammāyūhana kāle”ti pāṇāti pātādikassa tabbiramaṇādikassa ca tassa tassa duccaritasucaritakammassa āyūhanakāle.
anya-e0401n0:94_11: “Sabbaso abhāvaṃ patvāna nirujjhatī”ti yathā abyākata dhammānirujjhamānā sabbaso abhāvaṃ patvā nirujjhanti.
anya-e0401n0:94_13: “Sabbākāra paripūra”nti pāṇātipātaṃ karontassa kammānu rūpābahūkāya vacīmano vikārā sandissanti.
anya-e0401n0:95_2: “Khīraṃ vamuccatī”ti yathā khīraṃ nāma imasmiṃ divase muccati.
anya-e0401n0:95_5: Na tathā pāpaṃ kataṃ kammanti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:95_9: “Visuṃ eko paramattha dhammotipi saṅkhyaṃ na gacchatī”ti visuṃ sampayutta dhamma bhāvena saṅkhyaṃ na gacchatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:95_10: So hi kammapaccayadhammattā paramattha dhammo na hotīti na vattabbo.
anya-e0401n0:96_7: Pakkhantarena sādhāraṇatā nāmapakkhantarassa nānappakārato sajjanameva lagganamevāti vuttaṃ byabhicārassāti pasaṅgassa iccevatthoti.
anya-e0401n0:96_9: Akusalahetūhi ca sahetukatā sambhavo natthīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:98_10: Paṭisandhibhavaṅgacuticittāni nāma kevalaṃ kammavegukkhittabhāvenasantānepatitamattattā dubbala kiccāni honti.
anya-e0401n0:98_11: Pañca viññāṇāni ca asārānaṃ abalānaṃ pasādavatthūnaṃ nissāya uppannattā dubbalavatthukāni honti.
anya-e0401n0:98_12: Sampaṭicchanādīni ca pañcaviññāṇānubandha mattattā dubbala kiccaṭṭhānāni honti.
anya-e0401n0:98_13: Tasmā tāni sabbāni attano ussāhenavinā kevalaṃ vipaccanamattena pavattanti.
anya-e0401n0:98_18: “Ussāharahitāni evā”ti yathā rukkhānaṃ vātapupphāni nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n0:98_20: Tathā tāni ca vipākuppādakataṇhāsineharahitattā ussāhabyāpāra rahitāni eva.
anya-e0401n0:99_2: “Picupiṇḍakānaṃ viyā”ti dvinnaṃ kappāsapicupiṇḍakānaṃ aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanaṃ viya upādārūpānañca aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanaṃ dubbalamevāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:99_10: Kammānubhāvato ca muñcitvā yathāpurimaṃ vipākasantānaṃ kammānubhāvena pavattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:99_13: “Visadisacittasantāna parāvaṭṭanavasenā”ti purimenavipāka citta santānena visadisaṃ kusalādi javana cittasantānaṃ parato āvaṭṭā pana vasena.
anya-e0401n0:99_18: “Attano pacchā pavattassa cittassa vasenā”ti attano pacchā pavattaṃ cittaṃ paṭicca na vattabboti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:99_19: “Attano paccayehi eva so sakkā vattu”nti attano paccayesu balavantesu sati,
anya-e0401n0:100_6: “Tānipi hi aparibyattakiccāniyevā”ti ettha āvajjana dvayaṃ javanānaṃ purecārika kiccattā aparibyattakiccaṃ hotu.
anya-e0401n0:100_7: Hasituppādacittaṃ pana javanakiccattā kathaṃ aparibyattakiccaṃ bhaveyyāti.
anya-e0401n0:100_8: Tampi sabbaññutaññāṇādīnaṃ anucārikamattattā aparibyattakiccaṃ nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n0:100_9: “Aṭṭhamahāvipākesu viya vattabbo”ti mahāvipākānaṃ sasaṅkhārikā saṅkhārikabhāvo purimabhave maraṇāsannakāle
anya-e0401n0:100_10: ārammaṇānaṃ payogena saha vā vinā vā upaṭṭhānaṃ paṭicca vutto,
anya-e0401n0:101_1: “Dubbala kammanibbattesū”ti paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cutikiccāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:101_6: Chasuvatthu rūpesu hadayavatthumeva suvaṇṇarajataṃ viya sāravatthu hoti.
anya-e0401n0:101_7: Itarāni phalikāniviya pasādamattattā asārāni hontīti vuttaṃ “cakkhādīsu dubbalavatthūsū”ti.
anya-e0401n0:101_8: Dassanādīni ca kiccāni javana kiccassa purecarattā khuddakiccāni honti.
anya-e0401n0:102_1: Idha dīpaniyaṃ iccevanti padaṃ aṭṭhārasātipadassavisesananti katvā “sabbathāpīti padassa…pe…
anya-e0401n0:102_3: Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana taṃ sabbathāpīti padassa visesananti katvā “sabbathā pītikusalākusalavipākakiriyābhedenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:104_3: Yathā aṭṭhacittāni lokuttarānīti ca vutte avuttepisijjhanti sesacittāni lokiyānīti ca sauttarānīti cāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:104_5: “Anicchante yevā”ti sacepi avīcinimittassādavatthu viya keci icchantu.
anya-e0401n0:104_7: “Sobhagga pattiyā”ti ettha subhagassa bhāvo sobhagganti viggaho.
anya-e0401n0:105_9: Atha sabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ yāthāvato na jānāti,
anya-e0401n0:105_16: tattha taṃ ñāṇameva na hotīti āpajjatīti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n0:105_17: Ñāṇena cintessāmīti cintentānaṃpi yattha yattha yāthāvato jānanaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0401n0:105_18: tattha tattha ñāṇa vippayutta cittaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:105_19: Ñāṇappaṭi rūpakā ca dhammā atthi cittañca vitakko ca,
anya-e0401n0:105_22: Etehi cintentāpi ahaṃ ñāṇena cintemīti maññanti.
anya-e0401n0:105_25: “Abyāpajjalokūpapattitā”ti ettha abyāpajjaloko nāma kāyikadukkha cetasika dukkha rahito uparidevaloko vā brahmaloko vā.
anya-e0401n0:105_28: Abyāpajjalokaṃ upapatti yassa so abyāpajja lokūpapatti.
anya-e0401n0:106_0: Tesaṃ uppatti vidhānaṃ visuddhi magge khandhaniddese evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:106_1: Yadāhi deyyadhamma paṭiggāhakādi sampattiṃ aññaṃ vā somanassahetuṃ āgamma haṭṭhatuṭṭho atthidinnantiādinayappavattaṃ
anya-e0401n0:106_2: sammādiṭṭhiṃ purekkhitvā asaṃsīdanto anussāhitoparehi dānādīni puññāni karoti,
anya-e0401n0:106_3: tadāssa somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇa sampayuttaṃ cittaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:106_4: Yadā pana vuttanayena haṭṭhatuṭṭho sammādiṭṭhiṃ purekkhitvā amutta cā gatādivasena saṃsīdamāno vā parehi vā ussāhito karoti,
anya-e0401n0:106_6: Imasmiñhi atthe saṅkhāroti etaṃ attano vā paresaṃ vā vasena pavattassa pubbappayogassādhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:106_7: Yadā pana ñāti janassa paṭipatti dassanena jātaparicayābāladārakā bhikkhū disvā somanassa jātāsahasā kiñci deva hatthagataṃ dadanti vā vandanti vā,
anya-e0401n0:106_9: Yadā pana dethavandathāti ñātīhi ussāhitā evaṃ paṭipajjanti,
anya-e0401n0:106_11: Yadā pana deyyadhamma paṭiggāhakādīnaṃ asampattiṃ aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ āgamma catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti.
anya-e0401n0:107_1: Aṭṭhapīti ettha pisaddena imāni cittāni na kevalaṃ aṭṭheva honti.
anya-e0401n0:107_2: Atha kho tato bahūnipi bahutarānipi hontīti imaṃ sampiṇḍanatthaṃ dīpetīti dassetuṃ “tenā”tiādivuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:107_3: Dasasu puññakiriyāvatthūsu diṭṭhuju kammaṃ nāma ñāṇa kiccaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:107_4: Taṃ kathaṃ ñāṇa vippayutta cittehi karontīti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n0:107_5: Ñāṇa sampayutta cittehi diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃkarontā tesaṃ antarantarā ñāṇasote patitavasena ñāṇavippayutta cittehipi karontiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:107_22: Tīṇi ca kammāni karontā te heva aṭṭhahi karonti.
anya-e0401n0:107_26: Tasmā puna anukkamena ārammaṇādīhi vaḍḍhanaṃ karoti.
anya-e0401n0:107_30: Tathā ñāṇavippayuttāni dvesahassāni sataṃ saṭṭhi ca hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:107_34: “Nānāvajjanavīthiya”nti ñāṇavippayutta vīthīhi visuṃ bhūtāya āvajjanāya yutta vīthiyaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:108_8: Evaṃ pariyāyattha saṅkhātaṃ abhidhānatthaṃ dassetvā idāni aṭṭhakathāsu āgataṃ vacanatthaṃ dasseti kucchitetiādinā.
anya-e0401n0:108_19: Tena sambhūtaṃ sañjātaṃ kosalla sambhūtaṃ tiviggaho.
anya-e0401n0:109_2: “Dubbala kammenā”ti tihetukomakena vā dvihetuka kusala kammena vā.
anya-e0401n0:109_3: “Kehici ācariyehī”ti moravāpi vāsī mahādattattheraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:110_6: Bhūtakathana visesanaṃ tena nivattetabbassa atthassa abhāvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:110_8: “Byavacchedakavisesana”nti ahetuka vipākakiriya cittānañca sabbhāvātappasaṅgassa avacchedakaṃ visesanaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:110_9: “Yathā sakkhara kathalikaṃpi macchagumbaṃpi tiṭṭhantaṃpi carantaṃpi passatī”ti vacane sakkhara kathalikaṃ tiṭṭhantaṃ,
anya-e0401n0:110_10: macchagumbaṃ tiṭṭhantaṃpi carantaṃpi passatīti evaṃ yathā lābha yojanā hoti.
anya-e0401n0:112_2: Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito paranimmita vasavattideve anto karitvāti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ
anya-e0401n0:112_3: niddiṭṭhattā idhakāmasaddena sahokāsākāmabhūmi vuccatīti āha “kāme kāmabhūmiya”nti.
anya-e0401n0:112_5: “Kriyā cā”ti ettha ca saddo pana saddattho.
anya-e0401n0:112_10: Bhavo nāma indriya baddhasantānagato dhamma samūho vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:112_11: Idha pana kāmāvacarā dhammāti pade kāmasaddo.
anya-e0401n0:112_12: So ca pathavi pabbatādīhi saddhiṃ sabbaṃ kāmabhūmiṃ vadatīti vuttaṃ “bhūmipariyāyo cā”tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:112_13: “Indriyānindriyabaddha dhamma samūho”ti indriyabaddha dhamma samūho sattasantānāgato,
anya-e0401n0:112_14: anindriyabaddha dhamma samūho pathavi pabbatādi gato.
anya-e0401n0:114_4: Pañcannañhi ekato sāmaggiyaṃ satiyeva appanā hoti, no asati.
anya-e0401n0:114_5: Sāmaggiyanti ca suṭṭhu balavatāya samaggabhāveti attho.
anya-e0401n0:114_7: Jhānaṃ duvidhaṃ ārammaṇūpanijjhānañca lakkhaṇū panijjhānañcāti āha “kasiṇādikassā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n0:114_9: Upanijjhānanti ca kasiṇa nimittādikaṃ ārammaṇaṃ cetasā upagantvānijjhānaṃ olokanaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:114_11: Agginā viya kaṭṭhānaṃ kilesānaṃ dayhanatoti attho.
anya-e0401n0:114_12: Ekaggatā eva sātissaya yuttā appanāpattakāleti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:114_13: Pubbabhāge pana pathamajjhāne vitakkassa balavabhāvo icchitabbo.
anya-e0401n0:115_11: Samasaddo pana dhammena samena rajjaṃ kāretītiādīsu viya nāmikasaddoti dvidhā vikappaṃ dassento “sāyeva citta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:115_21: “Līnuddhaccābhāvā pādanenā”ti līnassa ca uddhaccassa ca abhāvo līnuddhaccābhāvo.
anya-e0401n0:115_26: Iti evaṃ imesu dvīsu atthesu ekaggatā eva sātissayayuttāti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:115_36: “Saṃsappitu”nti evaṃ nu kho aññathānu khoti dvidhā cañcalituṃ.
anya-e0401n0:116_0: Evaṃ upanijjhānatthaṃ dassetvā jhāpanatthaṃ dassento “tesu cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:116_3: Pageva kāyavacīdvāresūti evaṃ sambhāvanattho cettha pisaddo.
anya-e0401n0:116_5: “Jhāpitā nāma hontī”ti jhānaṅga dhammaggīhi daḍḍhānāma honti.
anya-e0401n0:116_6: “Evaṃ santepi tesaṃ samudāye eva jhāna vohāro siddho”ti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:116_7: “Dhamma sāmaggipadhāna”nti jhānaṭṭhāne jhānaṅga dhammānaṃ maggaṭṭhāne maggaṅga dhammānaṃ bodhiṭṭhāne bojjhaṅga dhammānaṃ samaggabhāvappadhānaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:117_0: Evaṃ saṅgahakārānaṃ matiyā jhānaṃ vatvā idāni aparesānaṃ matiyā taṃ dassetuṃ “apare”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:117_10: Jhānapaccayoti jhānaṅgānijhānasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃ samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ jhānapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0401n0:117_11: Maggapaccayoti maggaṅgāni maggasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃ samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayoti.
anya-e0401n0:118_10: nīvaraṇānaṃ āsanne ṭhitoti evaṃ vitakke ādīnavaṃ disvā nibbindati.
anya-e0401n0:118_13: Vitakkavirāgo ca so bhāvanā cāti samāso.
anya-e0401n0:118_15: Ajjhāsaya balena pādakajjhānasadisaṃ na hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:119_2: “Saṅkhāra bhedo na vutto”ti pathamajjhāna kusala cittaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ,
anya-e0401n0:119_17: Ettha abhiññābhedena saṅkhāra bhedo na vattabbo,
anya-e0401n0:119_18: paṭipadā bhedeneva vattabboti dassetuṃ “khippābhiññajjhānānaṃpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:119_21: Dandhā asīghā abhiññā yesaṃ tāni dandhābhiññāni. Jhānāni.
anya-e0401n0:119_22: “Yadi eva”nti evaṃ paṭipadā bhedena saṅkhāra bhedo yadi siyāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:119_28: “Satthena hanitvā”ti pare na satthena hananato chindanato.
anya-e0401n0:119_31: Anāgāmino hi suddha vipassanāyānikāpi samānā samādhismiṃ paripūrakārino nāma honti.
anya-e0401n0:119_32: Icchante susati kiñci nimittaṃ ārabbhamanasikāra mattenapi jhānaṃ ijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:119_34: “Rūpībrahmaloke”ti idaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃpi tattha pākatikabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:119_35: Arūpī brahmaloke pana ekā eva samāpatti pākatikāsambhavati.
anya-e0401n0:119_36: Upapattisiddhajjhānānaṃ bhavantare sannihita paccayabhedena saṅkhāra bhedo vutto,
anya-e0401n0:119_39: Ekasmiṃ bhavesabbappathamaṃ laddhakāle saṅkhāra bhedassa āsannattā vaḷañjanakālepi so eva saṅkhāra bhedo siyāti āsaṅkāsambhavato idaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:119_40: Tena bhavantare upapatti siddhajjhānānaṃ sannihita paccayabhedena saṅkhārabhede vattabbameva natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:119_41: Idāni tāni magga siddhajjhāna upapatti siddhajjhānāni sannihitapaccayaṃ anapekkhitvā maggakkhaṇa upapattikkhaṇesu
anya-e0401n0:119_42: siddhakāle jhānuppatti paṭipadāya eva sabbaso abhāvaṃ gahetvā aparaṃ vikappaṃ dassetuṃ “jhānuppatti paṭipadā
anya-e0401n0:119_44: Evaṃ mahaggatajhānānaṃ aṭṭhakathāvasena siddhaṃ saṅkhāra bhedaṃ vatvā idāni pāḷivasenāpi so siddho yevāti dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:119_49: kasmā idha saṅkhārabhedo na vuttotiādinā vacanakkamena siddho hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:120_2: Parikammaṃ nāma pathavī, pathavī, āpo, āpo- tiādikaṃ,
anya-e0401n0:120_12: Tattha parikamma pubbābhisaṅkhāro pakati pubbābhisaṅkhāro nāma,
anya-e0401n0:120_19: Jhānāni ca sabbāni uppannāni nāma natthīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:120_24: imesaṃ sattānaṃ sabbakappesupi kappavināsakāle jhānāni bhāvetvā brahmaloka parāyanatā sabbhāvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:120_26: Dūrabhave pana samathakammesu akatādhikāro nāma koci natthīti.
anya-e0401n0:120_28: Vipākajjhānesu saṅkhāra bhedassa pubba kammavasena vattabbattā “kusala kriyajjhānesū”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:120_29: “Athavātiādiko pacchima vikappo nāma” athavā pubbābhisaṅkhāreneva uppajjamānassa nakadāci asaṅkhārikabhāvo sambhavatīti asaṅkhārikanti ca,
anya-e0401n0:120_30: byabhicārābhāvato sasaṅkhārikanti ca na vuttanti ayaṃ vikappo.
anya-e0401n0:120_31: Tattha asaṅkhārikanti ca na vuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:120_39: Na ca niratthakavacanaṃ paṇḍitā vadanti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:120_41: Sati pana sambhave ca byabhicāre ca,
anya-e0401n0:121_4: pacchādandhaṃ vā khippaṃ vā uppannaṃ jhānaṃ sukhappaṭipadaṃ nāma karotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:121_14: Bhikkhu bhāveṭhitānaṃ vinaya paññattiṃ vītikkamitvā akatappaṭikammo vītikkamo paññattivītikkamantarāyiko nāma.
anya-e0401n0:121_16: Ariyapuggalānaṃ jātiādīhi upavaditvā akkositvā akatappaṭikammaṃ akkosanaṃ ariyūpavādantarāyiko nāma.
anya-e0401n0:121_17: Idhapi paṭikamme kate antarāyiko na hoti.
anya-e0401n0:121_19: Ime dhammā imasmiṃ bhave jhānamaggānaṃ antarāyaṃ karontīti antarāyikā nāma.
anya-e0401n0:121_20: Tehi vimutto antarāyika dhamma vimutto nāma.
anya-e0401n0:121_21: “Kalyāṇappaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito”ti sīlavisuddhi ādikāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyaṃ paripūraṇa vasena ṭhito.
anya-e0401n0:121_25: na taṃ apatvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃ pavattena sammappadhāna vīriyena samannāgato.
anya-e0401n0:121_26: So hi pahito pesito anapekkhito attabhāvo anenāti pahitattoti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:122_6: “Asadisaṃpī”ti tihetukukkaṭṭhaṃpi kammaṃ ahetukavipākaṃpi janetītiādinā asadisaṃpi vipākaṃ janeti.
anya-e0401n0:122_7: “Bhavaṅgaṭṭhānesu yevā”ti ettha bhavaṅga saddena paṭisandhiṭṭhāna cutiṭṭhānānipi saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0401n0:122_9: dutīyajjhāna kusalaṃ dutīyajjhāna vipākameva janetītiādinā kusala sadisameva vipākaṃ janeti.
anya-e0401n0:122_11: kriyajjhānaṃ nāma hoti” abhedū pacārenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:122_12: Bhedampi abhedaṃ katvā upacāro vohāro abhedū pacāro.
anya-e0401n0:123_3: Atthato pana jhānehi sampayogabhedo jhānabhedoti vutto hotīti āha “jhānehi sampayogabhedenā”ti.
anya-e0401n0:123_7: katvekekantu pañcadhāti vacanaṃ disvā idha jhāna bhedenāti jhānaṅgehi sampayogabhedenāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:123_8: Evaṃ santepi idha jhānabhedassa visuṃ adhippetattā “aññohi jhānabhedo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:125_8: Kasiṇa nimittaṃ ugghāṭetvā laddho ākāso kasiṇugghāṭimākāso,
anya-e0401n0:125_11: “Anantabhāvena pharīyatī”ti caturaṅgulamattopiso ananta nāmaṃ katvā bhāvanāmanasikārena pharīyati.
anya-e0401n0:125_12: “Devānaṃ adhiṭṭhānavatthū”ti mahiddhikānaṃ gāmanagara devānaṃ balippaṭiggahaṇaṭṭhānaṃ vuccati,
anya-e0401n0:125_13: yattha manussā samaye kula devatānaṃ baliṃ abhiharanti.
anya-e0401n0:125_26: “Anantanti bhāvanāya pavattattā”ti idaṃ pathamā ruppaviññāṇaṃ anantanti evaṃ pubbabhāga bhāvanāya pavattattā.
anya-e0401n0:125_37: “Desanāsīsamattaṃ”ti rājā āgacchatītiādīsu viya padhāna kathāmattanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:125_39: Kusalabhūtaṃ pathamā ruppaviññāṇaṃ puthujjanānañca sekkhānañca kusalabhūtassa dutīyāruppaviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:125_41: ekopathamā ruppeṭhatvā arahattaṃ patvā pathamāruppaṃ asamāpajjitvāva dutīyā ruppaṃ uppādeti.
anya-e0401n0:125_42: Tassa kusalabhūtaṃ pathamā ruppaṃ kriyabhūtassa dutīyā ruppassa ārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:125_43: Ekopathamā ruppeṭhatvā arahattaṃ patvā puna tameva pathamā ruppaṃ samāpajjitvā dutīyā ruppaṃ uppādeti.
anya-e0401n0:125_45: Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ kriyabhūtaṃ pathamā ruppaviññāṇaṃ kriyabhūtasseva dutīyāruppassa ārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:127_8: kathaṃ yāva anupādisesa nibbānadhātuyāsavati sandatīti āha “ānubhāvappharaṇavasenā”ti.
anya-e0401n0:127_17: “Na punetī”ti na puna eti nupagacchati ariyasāvako.
anya-e0401n0:127_20: Evaṃ taṃ anivattagamanaṃ pāḷisādhakehi dīpetvā idāni yuttisādhakehi pakāsetuṃ “yathā cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:127_33: “Ādito pajjanaṃ”ti catūsu maggesu ādimhi pathama maggasotassa pajjanaṃ gamanaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:127_37: Sabbe bodhipakkhiya dhammā anivatta gatiyā pavattamānā sototi vuccantīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:127_39: Uparisambodhi eva parāyanaṃ yesaṃ te uparisambodhi parāyanā.
anya-e0401n0:127_41: Kathaṃ sotāpatti vacanaṃ maggena samānādhikaraṇaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “pathama magga saṅkhātāya sotāpattiyā”tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:127_43: Mārenta gamanoniruttinayena maggoti sijjhatīti vuttaṃ “kilese mārento gacchatīti maggo”ti.
anya-e0401n0:128_2: “Sakiṃ āgacchatī”ti itogantvā puna idha āgacchatīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:128_14: “Ayañca attho”ti paṭisandhivasena sakiṃ imaṃ lokaṃ āgacchatītiādiko attho.
anya-e0401n0:128_16: Maggasahāyena jhānena vikkhambhitā kilesā maggena samucchinna gatikā honti.
anya-e0401n0:128_24: “Nānatthā sambhavato”ti dvīsu itthattasaddesu ekasmiṃ imaṃ kāmāvacara lokanti ekasmiṃ imaṃ manussa lokanti evaṃ nānatthānaṃ asambhavato.
anya-e0401n0:128_25: Pāḷiyaṃ “sabyā bajjho”ti cetodukkha saṅkhātena cetasikarogā bādhena sahito.
anya-e0401n0:128_29: “Pacchimassa vākyassā”ti āgantvā itthattaṃ sotāpanna sakadāgāmino tena daṭṭhabbāti vākyassa.
anya-e0401n0:128_30: “Dvīsu sakadāgāmīsū”ti āgantvā itthattanti vuttattā tena atthena sakadāgāmināmakesu dvīsu sotāpanna sakadāgāmīsu.
anya-e0401n0:128_33: Brahmalokeṭhitānaṃ sotāpannānaṃ sattakkhattu parama tādibhāvo natthi viya dutīya phalaṭṭhānaṃ sakadāgāmi bhāvopi natthi.
anya-e0401n0:128_38: heṭṭhato āgantvā uparūpapatti cāti evaṃ heṭṭhūparūpapattivasena.
anya-e0401n0:128_40: “Pañcannaṃ idha niṭṭhā”ti pañcannaṃ puggalānaṃ idha kāmaloke niṭṭhā anupādisesa nibbānapattīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:128_43: tesaṃ attheso sakadāgāmi puggalo pañcavidhova vutto,
anya-e0401n0:128_48: Tattha “sakiṃ āgamanaṭṭhena āgato yevā”ti sakiṃ āgamanaṭṭhena sakadāgāmīsu āgatoyeva.
anya-e0401n0:128_49: Sabbaññu buddhāpi pathama phalaṭṭha bhūtā sattakkhattu paramatāyaṃ saṇṭhitā viyāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:128_52: Sabbaññu buddhāpi dutīya phalaṭṭhabhūtā sakiṃ āgamanappakatiyaṃ saṇṭhitāyeva honti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:128_53: tasmiṃ khaṇe taṃ sabhāvānati vattanatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:128_56: Etena yaṃ vuttaṃ vibhāvaniyaṃ pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu pañcamakova idhādhippetoti.
anya-e0401n0:128_58: pañcamako eva idha sakadāgāmipade adhippetesati itare cattāro kattha adhippetā siyunti vattabbattā.
anya-e0401n0:129_2: Orambhāgāya saṃvattantīti orambhāgiyāni kāmarāga byāpāda saṃyojanādīni.
anya-e0401n0:130_12: “Sacca satipaṭṭhāna vibhaṅgesu panā”ti sacca vibhaṅga satipaṭṭhāna vibhaṅgesu pana,
anya-e0401n0:130_13: sabbaṃ citta vaḍḍhanaṃ pāḷi aṭṭhakathāsu desanāvāre vicāretvā veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:132_9: “Aññe cā”ti tehi dasahi saṃyojanehi aññe ahirikānottappādike,
anya-e0401n0:133_9: Anuppādo dhammo sabhāvo yesaṃ te anuppāda dhammā.
anya-e0401n0:134_1: “Ādi anta padesve vā”tiādimhi dvādasā kusalānīti ca,
anya-e0401n0:134_2: ante kriya cittāni vīsatīti ca padesu.
anya-e0401n0:134_8: Magga phala nibbāna saṅkhāto dhamma viseso lokuttarabhūmi nāmāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:134_11: Itarā okāsabhūmi nippariyāya bhūmi na hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:134_13: “Dhammānaṃ taṃ taṃ avatthā visesavaseneva siddhā”ti etena avatthā bhūmi eva padhāna bhūmīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:134_16: Tāsaṃ taṇhānaṃ avisayabhūto saṇha sukhumākāro lokuttaratā nāma.
anya-e0401n0:134_17: Hīnānaṃ akusala kammānaṃ vasena hīnā apāyabhūmiyo.
anya-e0401n0:134_18: Paṇītānaṃ kusala kammānaṃ vasena paṇītā sugati bhūmiyo.
anya-e0401n0:134_19: Tattha ca nānā akusala kammānaṃ vā nānā kusala kammānaṃ vā oḷārika sukhumatā vasena nānā duggati bhūmiyo
anya-e0401n0:134_20: nānā sugati bhūmiyo ca siddhā hontīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “api cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:135_8: Iminā vacanena sakalampi gāthaṃ ekūna navutippabhedaṃ mānasaṃ ekavīsa sataṃ katvā vibhajantī-
anya-e0401n0:135_9: ti evaṃ ekavākyaṃ katvā yojanaṃ ñāpeti.
anya-e0401n0:135_19: “Evaṃ vutta”nti vibhāvaniyaṃ jhānaṅgavasena pathamajjhāna sadisattā pathamajjhānañcāti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:135_21: Na itarāni lokiyajjhānāni sātissayato jhānāni nāma siyuṃ.
anya-e0401n0:135_31: Yathālokiyajjhānesu upacārabhūtā bhāvanā kāci vitakka virāga bhāvanā nāma hoti…pe…
anya-e0401n0:135_33: Asaññi gāmīnaṃ pana saññā virāga bhāvanā nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n0:135_35: “Sā”ti upacāra bhāvanā.“Upekkhā sahagataṃ vā”ti ettha vā saddena rūpasamatikkamaṃ vā saññā samatikkamaṃ vāti avuttaṃ vikappeti.
anya-e0401n0:135_41: Attano jhānaṃ avitakkaṃ kātunti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:136_2: “Vipassanā pākatikā evā”tikāci virāga bhāvanā nāma na hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:136_10: Yato yato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ye ye samāpatti dhamme sammasitvā maggo nibbattito hoti.
anya-e0401n0:136_13: Ettha hi “yato yato samāpattito vuṭṭhāyā”ti etena pādakajjhānaṃ kathitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:136_14: “Pādakajjhāne satī”ti etena ayaṃ vādopi pādakajjhānena vinā nasijjhatīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:136_16: pattā hotī”ti etena imasmiṃ vādepi vipassanā niyāmo icchitabboti dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:136_20: Pañcamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya hi pathamajjhānādīni sammasato uppannamaggo pathamattheravādena pañcamajjhāniko,
anya-e0401n0:136_21: dutīya vādena pathamādijjhāniko āpajjatīti dvepi vādā virujjhanti.
anya-e0401n0:136_23: taṃ jhāniko hotīti te ca vādā na virujjhanti,
anya-e0401n0:136_24: ajjhāsayo ca sātthako hotīti evaṃ aviruddho vutto hotīti.
anya-e0401n0:136_31: Pāḷiyaṃ “ajjhattaṃ suññataṃ manasi karotī”ti ajjhattasantānetaṃ taṃ jhānañca jhānasahagatañca khandha
anya-e0401n0:136_32: pañcakaṃ nicca sukha atta jīvato suññataṃ manasi karoti.
anya-e0401n0:137_2: Upacāra bhāvanā eva uparijjhāne jhānaṅgaṃ niyāmetīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:137_3: Heṭṭhā pana ajjhāsayo eva uparijjhāne jhānaṅgaṃ niyāmetīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:137_4: Tattha “ajjhāsayo evā”ti eva saddena pādakajjhānaṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0401n0:137_5: “Idha upacāra bhāvanā evā”ti eva saddena ajjhāsayaṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0401n0:137_6: Etesu hi dvīsu saha bhāvīsu upacāra bhāvanā eva padhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:137_7: Ajjhāsayo pana tassa nānā sattiyogaṃ sādheti.
anya-e0401n0:137_8: “Ajjhāsaya sāmaññaṃ saṇṭhātī”ti magge yaṃ laddhabbaṃ hoti,
anya-e0401n0:137_10: mayhaṃ viseso natthīti evaṃ ajjhāsaya sāmaññaṃ saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0401n0:137_15: “Sabbajjhānesu ciṇṇavasibhūtānaṃ”ti idaṃ samāpajjananti ca nibbattananti ca pada dvaye sambandha vacanaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:137_16: “Vipassanā visesatthāya evā”ti vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanā visesatthāya eva.
anya-e0401n0:137_17: Yasmā pana aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ekekāya samāpattiyā vuṭṭhāya vuṭṭhita samāpatti dhamma sammasanaṃ āgataṃ,
anya-e0401n0:137_27: “Tattha ṭhito”ti tasmiṃ pathamajjhāne aparihīno hutvā ṭhito.
anya-e0401n0:137_33: “Pīti sukhaṃ”ti pītiyā ca sukhena ca sampannaṃ. Athavā,
anya-e0401n0:137_34: vivekehi jātāni pīti sukhāni assāti vivekajaṃ pīti sukhaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:137_42: “Tattha parinibbāyī”ti brahmaloke avassaṃ parinibbāya na dhammo.
anya-e0401n0:138_4: tato paraṃ pavattaṃ cittasantānaṃ vitakke ninnaṃ hoti,
anya-e0401n0:138_7: Tato paraṃ pavattaṃ cittasantānaṃ vicāre ninnaṃ hoti,
anya-e0401n0:139_4: Pādakajjhānādīnaṃ vasena siddhoti gahite satīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:139_5: “Yāya kāya ci vedanāya yuttā hutvā”ti somanassa vedanāya vāyuttā hutvā upekkhā vedanāya vā yuttā hutvā.
anya-e0401n0:139_6: “Tehi niyamitāya ekekāya magga vedanāyā”ti pādakajjhānādīhi niyamitāya magge somanassa vedanāya eva vāsaddhiṃ
anya-e0401n0:139_7: ghaṭiyeyya magge upekkhā vedanāya eva vāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:139_9: Tasmā maggejhānaṅga niyame siddhe magge vedanā niyamopi siddho.
anya-e0401n0:139_10: Tāni pana pādakajjhānādīni majjhe vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanāyaṃ nakiñciniyāmenti.
anya-e0401n0:139_12: pādakajjhānādīhi niyamitāya magge ekekāya vedanāya saddhiṃ dve dve vipassanā vedanāyo ghaṭiyeyyuṃ.
anya-e0401n0:139_13: Magge somanassa vedanāya vā saddhiṃ dve vipassanā vedanāyo ghaṭiyeyyuṃ.
anya-e0401n0:139_14: Magge upekkhā vedanāya vā saddhiṃ dve vipassanā vedanāyo ghaṭiyeyyuṃti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:139_15: Evañcasati ekavīthiyaṃ javanāni bhinna vedanāni siyuṃ.
anya-e0401n0:139_17: Tasmā magge vedanā niyamo pādakajjhānādi niyamena siddho na hoti,
anya-e0401n0:139_19: Tāni pana pādakajjhānādīni majjhe vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanāyaṃ na kiñci na niyāmenti.
anya-e0401n0:139_20: Vedanaṃ niyāmenti yevāti dassetuṃ “taṃpi na yujjatī”ti vatvā “pādakajjhānādīnaṃ vasenevā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:139_21: “Cha nekkhammassitā upekkhā”ti ekāva catutthajjhānu pekkhā chasu ārammaṇesu somanassāni pajahitvā pavattattā cha nekkhammassitā upekkhā nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n0:139_22: “Cha nekkhammassitāni somanassānī”ti ekaṃ vapathamajjhāna somanassaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu cha gehassitāni
anya-e0401n0:139_23: pajahitvā pavattattā cha nekkhammassitāni somanassāni nāma honti.
anya-e0401n0:139_25: “Pathamādīni ca tīṇi jhānānī”ti catukkanaye tīṇi somanassa jhānāni pādakāni katvā.
anya-e0401n0:139_26: “Suddhasaṅkhāre ca pādakekatvā”ti ārammaṇa bhāvena pādakekatvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:139_27: Ayañca pādakajjhānādīnaṃ vasena vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanāyañca magge ca vedanā pariṇāmo aṭṭhasāliniyaṃpi vitthārato vutto.
anya-e0401n0:139_28: “Amānusī ratī hotī”ti manussānaṃ gehassitaratiṃ atikkamma ṭhitattā amānusī nāma rati hoti.
anya-e0401n0:139_29: “Sammadhammaṃ vipassato”ti sammā anicca lakkhaṇa dhammaṃ passantassa bhikkhunoti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:140_4: Idha citta bhedassa adhippetattā jhānabhedeti ca jhānanti ca vuttepi cittameva adhippetanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:141_1: “Aparāpi yojanā vuttā”ti athavā rūpāvacaraṃ cittaṃ anuttarañca pathamādijjhāna bhedena yathā gayhati,
anya-e0401n0:141_2: tathā āruppañcāpi pañcamejhāne gayhatīti evaṃ aparāpi yojanā vuttā.
anya-e0401n0:141_8: “Āhā”ti ca “āhū”ti ca vattamānakālepi icchanti saddavidūti vuttaṃ “kathenti vā”ti.
anya-e0401n0:141_10: vibhajanti vicakkhaṇā”ti gāthāya nigamananti ñāpanatthaṃ “vibhajanti vicakkhaṇā”ti vuttaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:145_1: Evaṃ citta saṅgahassa dīpaniṃ katvā cetasika saṅgahassa dīpaniṃ karonto pathamaṃ pubbāparānu sandhiñca
anya-e0401n0:145_8: tasmā idāni taṃ saṅgahaṃ karotīti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n0:145_14: Cittaṃ nissāya attano attano kiccesu ussukkaṃ āpannāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:145_18: Siddhapadaṃ nāma pakati paccayehi nipphanna padaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:145_20: Uddhaṃ pajjanaṃ nāma katamanti āha “sarūpato pātubhavana”nti.
anya-e0401n0:145_24: “Sarūpa vināso”ti sarūpato pātubhavantassa bhāvassa vināso antaradhānaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:145_26: “Eka cittassapi bahudevā”ti cakkhu viññāṇaṃ rūpaṃ passantaṃ ekameva rūpaṃ passatīti natthi.
anya-e0401n0:145_30: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhu viññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:145_31: Sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇantiādinā vatthudvāresu ekavacanaṃ vatvā ārammaṇesu bahuvacanaṃ katanti.
anya-e0401n0:145_32: “Ekattaṃ upanetvā”ti cakkhu viññāṇe bahūnipi rūpārammaṇāni rūpatā samaññena ekībhāvaṃ katvā ekaṃ ārammaṇantveva vuttanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:145_44: “Uppādādippavattito”ti uppādassa ca jīraṇassa ca nirodhassa ca pavattito.
anya-e0401n0:145_51: ntiādīsu ayaṃ ratana bhāvo paṇītoti hettha attho.
anya-e0401n0:145_53: “Sahajāta paccayuppanna rūpāni pī”ti sahajātapaccayato uppannāni rūpānipi.
anya-e0401n0:145_57: Tadeva hetumanta visesananti ca hetu anto nītavisesananti ca hetu anto gadhavisesananti ca vadanti.
anya-e0401n0:145_60: “Na hi sakkā jānituṃ”ti etena bhūtakathana visesanāni etānīti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n0:145_74: Ekasmiṃ rūpārūpakalāpe nānā dhammānaṃ vasena bahūsu uppādesu ca nirodhesu ca gahitesūti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:145_76: Sabbānipi upādārūpāni catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pavattattā mahābhūta gaṇanāya cattāri cattāri siyuṃti
anya-e0401n0:145_78: Sabbesampi vā cakkhādīnaṃ upādārūpānaṃ ekekasmiṃ kalāpe bahubhāvo vattabbo siyāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:146_1: ekasmiṃ cittuppāde lahutādīnipi ekekāni eva siyuṃ,
anya-e0401n0:146_2: atha kimatthaṃ dve dve katvā vuttānīti āha “kāyalahutā citta lahutādayopanā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n0:146_4: Vibhāvanipāṭhe “cittānuparivattino”ti etena cittena uppajjitvā teneva cittena sahanirujjhanavasena cittaṃ anuparivattissa.
anya-e0401n0:146_6: “Puretaramuppajjitvā”ti puretaraṃ ekena cittena saha uppajjitvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:146_8: Tathā rūpadhammānaṃ pasaṅgo na sakkā nīvāretuṃ tiyojanā.
anya-e0401n0:146_10: “Alamati papañcenā”ti abhidhamme vedanāttikeṭīkāsu viya ati vitthārena niratthakaṃ hotīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:147_4: Tañca saṅghaṭṭa naṃ nadosapaṭighassa viya ārammaṇassa vibādhanaṃ hoti,
anya-e0401n0:147_5: atha kho bhamarassa paduma pupphesu pupphara saggahaṇaṃ viya vijānana matte aṭhatvā ārammaṇa rasapātubhāvatthaṃ
anya-e0401n0:147_13: vedanā pātubhāvaṃ disvā ārammaṇapphusanaṃ ñāṇe pākaṭaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:147_18: Tattha sannipāto nāma tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dvārā rammaṇa viññāṇānaṃ saṅgati samāgamo samodhānaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:147_20: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhu viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0401n0:147_23: Saṅghaṭṭana kiccattā eva tiṇṇaṃ sannipāto hutvā dhamma cintāñāṇassa paṭimukhaṃ upaṭṭhāti pakāsatīti.
anya-e0401n0:147_25: Paccupaṭṭhānanti vā paññāṇaṃ vuccati dhajorathassa paññāṇanti ettha viya.
anya-e0401n0:147_30: Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana kasmā panettha phasso pathamaṃ vutto tipucchitvā mahāaṭṭhakathā vādotāva dassito.
anya-e0401n0:147_32: Ārammaṇasmiñhi cittassa pathamābhinipāto hutvā phasso ārammaṇaṃ phusamāno uppajjati.
anya-e0401n0:147_40: Api ca ayaṃ phasso nāma yathāpāsādaṃ patvā thambho nāma sesadabba sambhārānaṃ balavapaccayo.
anya-e0401n0:147_41: Evameva sahajāta sampayutta dhammānaṃ balava paccayo hoti.
anya-e0401n0:147_44: ekakkhaṇasmiñhi uppanna dhammānaṃ ayaṃ pathamaṃ uppanno ayaṃ pacchāti idaṃ vattuṃ na labbhā.
anya-e0401n0:147_45: Balavapaccayabhāvepi phassassakāraṇaṃ na dissatīti evaṃ taṃ vādaṃ paṭikkhipetvā idaṃ vuttaṃ desanā vāreneva phasso pathamaṃ vuttoti.
anya-e0401n0:147_48: Tesu pana dvīsu vādesu mahāaṭṭhakathā vādo eva yutto.
anya-e0401n0:147_49: Yañhi tattha vuttaṃ cittassa pathamābhinipāto hutvāti.
anya-e0401n0:147_51: Na panaññehi cetasikehi vinā visuṃ pathamaṃ uppannattā.
anya-e0401n0:147_52: Yathā taṃ ye keci bhikkhave dhammā akusalā akusalabhāgiyā akusalapakkhikā.
anya-e0401n0:147_54: mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ pathamaṃ uppajjatīti imasmiṃ sutte kiccappadhānattā mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ pathamaṃ uppajjatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:147_55: Na pana sabbacetasikehi vinā visuṃ pathamaṃ uppannattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:147_57: Phassohetu phasso paccayo vedanākkhandhassa paññā panāya.
anya-e0401n0:147_58: Phasso hetu phasso paccayo saññākkhandhassa paññā nāya.
anya-e0401n0:147_59: Phasso hetu phasso paccayo saṅkhārakkhandhassa paññāpanāyāti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:147_60: Tasmā sabbesaṃ cetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ phassappadhānattā eva phassa balavapaccayattā eva ca phasso pathamaṃ vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:147_61: Ettha ca cittaṃ ārammaṇa vijānanaṭṭhena phassādīnaṃ sabbacetasika dhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ hoti, padhānaṃ,
anya-e0401n0:147_63: Phasso pana ārammaṇa saṅghaṭṭanaṭṭhena sabbesaṃ cetasika dhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamo hoti, padhāno,
anya-e0401n0:147_65: Ettha codako phusanaṃ nāma sappaṭigharūpānaṃ eva kiccanti maññamāno “nanucā”tiādinā codeti.
anya-e0401n0:147_70: “Cittassa vikārā pattiṃ”ti calana kampana thambhana jeguccha bhaya tāsa chambhitattā divasena vikārā pajjanaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:147_72: dukkhavedanīyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca dukkha vedanātiādinā nayena phassa visesānurūpaṃ vedanā visesuppattiṃ sādheti.
anya-e0401n0:147_73: Ettha ca phusanaṃ nāma duvidhaṃ rūpapphusanaṃ,
anya-e0401n0:147_75: Tattha rūpapphusanaṃ nāma phoṭṭhabba dhātūnaṃ kiccaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:147_79: Api ca jhānamagga phala nibbānānaṃ paṭilābhopi phusananti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:147_87: Viññussa pana atipākaṭa phassa nidassanena appākaṭa phassa vibhāvanaṃ yuttameva.
anya-e0401n0:148_17: Tattha sūdo raññobhattaṃ pacanto rasajānanatthaṃ thokaṃ gahetvā jivhagge ṭhapetvā rasaṃ vīmaṃsati.
anya-e0401n0:149_3: Suṭṭhujānanañca nāma na viññāṇassa viya vividhajānanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:149_4: Na ca paññāya viya yathābhūtajānanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:149_7: Yaṃ yaṃ cha hi viññāṇehi vijānāti,
anya-e0401n0:149_9: Tassa tassa pacchā appamussakaraṇa mevāti vuttaṃ “punajānanatthaṃ saññāṇaṃ karotī”ti.
anya-e0401n0:149_11: Bhavantaraṃ patvāpi appamuṭṭhabhāvaṃ sādheti opapātika puggalānanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:149_16: Micchābhinivesa saññā nāma anicce niccantiādippavattā saññā.
anya-e0401n0:149_22: “Hatthi dassaka andhasadisā”ti ettha eko kira rājā keḷippasuto hoti.
anya-e0401n0:149_23: So jaccandhānaṃṭhāne ekaṃ hatthiṃ ānetvāṭhapento jaccandhe āha jānātha bho tumhe hatthinti.
anya-e0401n0:149_24: Te hatthiṃ jānissāmāti parāmasitvā attano parāmasitaṃ taṃ taṃ aṅgamavahatthīti abhinivisanti.
anya-e0401n0:149_26: Puna rājā te pucchi kīdiso bho hatthīti.
anya-e0401n0:149_27: Te rañño hatthisaṇṭhānaṃ ācikkhantā vivādaṃ āpajjanti.
anya-e0401n0:149_28: Ācikkhanameva raññohatthidassananti katvā te hatthidassaka andhāti vuccanti.
anya-e0401n0:149_29: “Upaṭṭhitavisayaggahaṇe”ti rattiyaṃ andhakāre rajjukkhaṇḍaṃ passantassa sappasaṇṭhānaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0401n0:149_32: Migapotakānañca araññekhettamajjhepurisasaṇṭhānaṃ tiṇa rūpaṃ passantānaṃ purisasaṇṭhā naṃ upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0401n0:149_33: Te upaṭṭhitaṃ saṇṭhānamattaṃ purisoti gaṇhitvā so amhe pahareyyāti palāyanti.
anya-e0401n0:150_3: Cetanañcettha abhisandhānaṃ vā vuccati pakappanaṃ vā āyūhanaṃ vāti evaṃ tidhā atthavikappaṃ dassetuṃ “sampayutta dhamme”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:150_8: “Pakappeti vāte”ti athavā te sampayutta dhamme pakārato kappeti, sajjeti.
anya-e0401n0:150_12: tvaṃ sañjānanakiccaṃ karohītiādinā vadamānā viya saṃvidahati.
anya-e0401n0:150_23: Jeṭṭhasisso nāma bahūsu sissesu jeṭṭhabhūto sisso.
anya-e0401n0:151_2: Ekattārammaṇaṃ nāma ekārammaṇassapi bahūsu sabhāvesu ekasabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ ārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:152_3: “Abhibhavitvā”ti jīvana kicce attano vasaṃ vattāpetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:153_11: Upatthambhitaṃ hutvā ārammaṇe ninnaṃ karotīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:153_14: “Samudāciṇṇaninnaniyāmitādīhī”ti ettha samudāciṇṇaṃ nāma āciṇṇa kammavasena suṭṭhu punappunaṃ ācaritaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:153_16: idaṃ nāma karissāmīti pubbe eva ajjhāsayena ninnaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:153_21: “Asati kāraṇa visese”ti bhavaṅga cittaṃ vīthicittuppattiyā asati,
anya-e0401n0:153_22: vīthicittāni ca kāyacittānaṃ akallādikevā adhimattassa ārammaṇantarassa upaṭṭhānevā asati.
