anya-e0401n0:416_20: “Taṃ dvayaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā”ti khandhapañcakassa kevalaṃ paccayāyatta vuttitañca khaṇabhaṅgañca ñāṇa cakkhunā suṭṭhudiṭṭhaṃ katvā.
anya-e0401n0:416_21: Tattha pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ suṭṭhupassanto kevalaṃ paccayāyatta vuttitañca avasāyatta vuttitañca suṭṭhu passati.
anya-e0401n0:416_22: Yo ca attano vasāyattavutti na hoti.
anya-e0401n0:416_23: So paramatthasaccaṃ patvā eso mama santakantipi vattuṃ nārahati.
anya-e0401n0:416_29: Asante ca attasmiṃ ko mama attā nāma bhaveyyāti.
anya-e0401n0:416_32: Satto ca nāma ekasmiṃbhave ādimhi sakiṃ eva jāyati.
anya-e0401n0:416_34: Antarā vassasataṃpi vassasahassaṃpi maraṇaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n0:416_37: Evaṃsante kathaṃ khaṇikadhammā sattassa sāraṭṭhena attānāma bhaveyyunti.
anya-e0401n0:416_38: Tasmā te avasavattanaṭṭhena asārakaṭṭhena ca anattā eva.
anya-e0401n0:416_39: Apica “avasavattanaṭṭhenā”ti ettha vaso nāma sattasantāne eko padhānadhammo.
anya-e0401n0:416_41: So eva padhānabhūtassa vasassapi attā bhaveyya. Evaṃsati, yo vaso, so attā. Yo attā,
anya-e0401n0:416_44: rūpaṃ attāti gaṇhanto rūpañca vasañca attānañca ekattaṃ katvā gaṇhāti nāma.
anya-e0401n0:416_48: satto ca khandhapañcakañca vaso ca attā ca sabbametaṃ ekattaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0401n0:416_50: Na hi imasmiṃ vasavattanaṭṭhe ekassasattassa dve attā tayo attā bahūattāti sakkā bhavituṃ.
anya-e0401n0:416_51: Atha yathā yathā sattassa vaso vattati,
anya-e0401n0:416_53: Tathā tathā khandhapañcakampi niccakālaṃ sattassavasaṃ anugaccheyya. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:416_54: sattassa ca khandhapañcakassa ca vasassa ca nānattābhāvato.
anya-e0401n0:416_60: Na hi dubbaṇṇo durūpo puriso attano rūpakāyaṃ attano vaseneva suvaṇṇaṃ surūpaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0401n0:416_69: Ajaraṃ vā amaraṇaṃ vā kātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0401n0:416_71: Patitvā vā tato vimuttaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0401n0:416_77: Tathā pana avasānugamanato paramattha saccaṃ patvā khandhapañcake attano sāmikiccaṃ issarakiccaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n0:416_81: attānaṃ tassa sāmiṃ issaraṃ katvā rūpaṃ me attāti gahaṇaṃ micchāgahaṇaṃ nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n0:416_82: Loke pana mahājano dhammānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ na jānanti,
anya-e0401n0:416_85: Tesaṃ parampara paccayavasena pavattamāne khandhasantāne sammuti saccavasena nānāvasavattanākārā nāma santi.
anya-e0401n0:416_87: Te sammuti saccavasena uppannesu tesu sāmiissarādhipati vohāresu vohāramatte aṭhatvā sabhāvasaccaṃ maññantā micchāgahaṇaṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e0401n0:416_92: Tassa khandhapañcakaṃ tassa vasāyatta vutti eva hotīti. Na hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:416_94: Tathāhi gantuṃ icchānāma bahiddhā dhanahetuvā uppajjeyya.
anya-e0401n0:416_98: yaṃ yaṃ dukkhaṃ āgaccheyya kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vā.
anya-e0401n0:416_99: Tesaṃ taṃ taṃ dukkhapaccayā dhanicchā nāma uppajjati.
anya-e0401n0:416_103: Tathā nānārammaṇānaṃ palobhana dukkhamūlikāsu ca nānāvitakkānaṃ vipphandanamūlikāsu ca icchāsu.
anya-e0401n0:416_104: Evaṃ vasopi paccayāyatta vuttiko eva hoti.
anya-e0401n0:416_107: Gamanampi tena teneva uppajjati āhārupatthambhanādipaccayena ca.
anya-e0401n0:416_108: Vaso pana gamanassa paccayeka desamattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:416_109: So hi tadaññapaccayehi vinā sayaṃ uppajjituṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0401n0:416_113: idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ paccayāyatta vuttikanticceva vattuṃ arahati.
anya-e0401n0:416_115: Api ca gantuṃ icchanto gacchatīti paññatti mattabhūto satto gacchati.
anya-e0401n0:416_116: Khandhapañcakaṃ pana khaṇika dhammattā na gacchati.
anya-e0401n0:416_123: Gamane ca sampajjamāne khaṇikabhijjanena doso natthīti ce. Atthi.
anya-e0401n0:416_126: gacchanto satto yadā kadāci maraṇaṃ vā nigacchati maraṇa mattaṃ vā dukkhanti.
anya-e0401n0:416_128: “Vipallāsanimittaṃ”ti ca vipallāsa dhammānaṃ vasena upaṭṭhitaṃ kicca nimittaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:416_131: Khandhesu suññatalakkhaṇaṃ nāma ati gambhīraṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:416_133: Suññata dassanañca diṭṭhiyā ujuppaṭipakkhanti āha “saṅkhāresu suññatadassanavasenā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n0:416_134: Tattha “attha siddhi nāmā”ti maggaphalappaṭilābhasaṅkhātassa atthassa siddhi nāma.
anya-e0401n0:416_139: Atthābhiniveso ca so diṭṭhiggāho cāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n0:416_147: Unnatilakkhaṇo ca ahaṃ māno khandhesu niccadhuvavipallāsamūlako saddhāya ca paṭipakkhoti āha “aniccadassanavasenā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n0:416_154: “Tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ”ti paññindriya saddhindriya samādhindriya saṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ indriya dhammānaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:416_155: “Vipassanā gamanavasene vā”ti vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanā saṅkhātassa āgamana kāraṇassa vaseneva.
anya-e0401n0:417_0: Idāni pubbe yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘sattaariya puggalavibhāgassa paccayabhāvapattiyā cā’ti.
anya-e0401n0:417_2: Dhammānusārī nāmāti ettha “dhammo”ti paññā vuccati ‘saccaṃ, dhammo, dhīti,
anya-e0401n0:417_5: Paññābalānusārena ādimhi maggaṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Athavā.
anya-e0401n0:417_7: Suññatadassanañca nāma visesato suddhadhamma dassanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:417_11: Ādito paṭṭhāya parisuddha dassanasampannattā diṭṭhibaleneva sukhena taṃ taṃ maggaphalaṃ pattoti diṭṭhipatto.
anya-e0401n0:417_12: Teneva dassana paññābalena kilesabandhanato vimuttoti paññāvimutto.
anya-e0401n0:417_13: Saṅkhāra dhammānaṃ khaṇika dhammabhāve suṭṭhu saddahanaṃ aveccappasādo saddhā nāma.
anya-e0401n0:417_20: Saddhābaleneva ādimhi ariyamaggaṃ pāpuṇātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:417_24: Attano kāye eva laddhaṃ sakkhaṃ yassāti kāyasakkhī.
anya-e0401n0:417_25: Dukkhānu passī puggalo hi saṃvega bahulo hoti.
anya-e0401n0:417_28: Tasmā so saṃvegavasena bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto yaṃ yaṃ purisathāmena pattabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:417_30: Pāpuṇanto ca attano kāye eva sakkhaṃ labhati.
anya-e0401n0:417_31: Sandiṭṭhaṃ jhānasukhaṃ vā maggaphalasukhaṃ vā labhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:417_32: “Ubhatobhāga vimutto”ti arūpajjhānehi rūpakāyato arahattamaggaphalehi nāmakāyatoti evaṃ ubhohi kāyabhāgehi vimutto.
anya-e0401n0:417_33: Ettha ca tayo ariyapuggalā paññādhiko ca saddhādhiko ca vīriyādhiko ca.
anya-e0401n0:417_34: Tattha dhammānusārī ca diṭṭhipatto ca paññāvimutto ca paññādhiko nāma.
anya-e0401n0:417_35: Saddhānusārī ca saddhāvimutto ca saddhādhiko nāma.
anya-e0401n0:417_36: Kāyasakkhī ca ubhatobhāgavimutto ca vīriyādhiko nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:417_38: Abhidhamme pana puggala paññattiyaṃ saddhāvimutto ca kāyasakkhī ca dvepuggalā sekkhesu eva vuttā.
anya-e0401n0:417_39: Arahattaṃ pattā pana ete dvepi paññāvimuttā evāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0401n0:417_41: saṅkhāra dhammānaṃ khaṇika dhammabhāve suṭṭhu saddahanaṃ aveccappasādo saddhā nāmāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:417_42: Kiṃ pana tādisena saddhāmattena sotāpatti maggaṃ pāpuṇātīti.
anya-e0401n0:417_45: Yathāha mahāvagge okkanta saṃyutte cakkhu bhikkhave aniccaṃ vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī,
anya-e0401n0:417_51: So yenakammena apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ uppajjeyya.
anya-e0401n0:417_56: Vipariṇāmoti ca khaṇe khaṇe jīraṇatā bhijjanatā vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:417_59: Sā eva sotāpattiyaṅgesu buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme,
anya-e0401n0:417_61: Tattha ñāṇasampayuttasaddhā nāma cakkhādīnaṃ aniccanimitta dassanaññāṇena sampayuttā okappanasaddhā.
anya-e0401n0:417_62: Aniccanimittañca nāma rūpaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenātipade vuttanayena cakkhādinissayānaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ santati parivattanādikaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:417_65: Tānipi khaṇe khaṇe ekantena bhijjati yevāti saddhādhimokkhaṃ saddhāvinicchayaṃ paṭilabhatīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:417_66: “Buddhe aveccappasādenā”ti ettha pana arahatā sammāsambuddhatādīnaṃ buddhaguṇādīnaṃ dassanaññāṇena sampayutto pasādo aveccappasādo nāma.
anya-e0401n0:417_67: Ariyabhūmi nāma diṭṭhānusaya vicikicchānusayehi parisuddhā avatthābhūmi vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:417_69: Kathaṃ pana tassa puggalassa puthujjanabhūmiṃ atikkantatā ariyabhūmiṃ okkantatā ca viññāyatīti āha “so yenā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n0:417_70: Yo attano jīvitahetupi kiñci kammapathapattaṃ apāyagāmi kammaṃ na karoti.
anya-e0401n0:417_74: Aparaṃpi vuttaṃ cakkhu bhikkhave vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī.
anya-e0401n0:417_77: Tattha “mattaso nijjhānaṃ khamatī”ti saddhānusārīviya saddahanamatte aṭṭhatvā cakkhādīnaṃ tādisaṃ aniccataṃ
anya-e0401n0:417_78: samanupassanto thokaṃ thokaṃ dassanaṃ labhatiyeva. Evaṃsati,
anya-e0401n0:417_79: cakkhādīni tassa puggalassa nijjhānaṃ olokanaṃ mattaso khamanti nāma.
anya-e0401n0:417_81: Aparaṃpi vuttaṃ cakkhu bhikkhave aniccaṃ vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī.
anya-e0401n0:417_84: Tattha “pajānāti passatī”ti dhammānusārīviya mattaso nijjhānakkhamamatte aṭṭhatvā paññāya pajānāti,
anya-e0401n0:418_0: “Yathā sakaṃ phalaṃ”ti ettha sassa attano idaṃ sakaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:418_1: Yaṃ yaṃ sakaṃ yathāsakanti atthaṃ dasseti sotāpannassātiādinā.
anya-e0401n0:418_2: Phalasamāpatti vīthiyaṃ pana anulomajavanāni eva phalānaṃ āsannakāraṇāni,
anya-e0401n0:419_4: Idaṃpi vipassanāñāṇaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenāti samanupassitabbā ca hotīti.
anya-e0401n0:419_5: Tattha ca abhidhammaṃ patvā sabhāvappadhānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0401n0:419_7: Tasmā abhidhamma nayena vipassanā attano nimitta nāmaṃ maggassa dātuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0401n0:419_13: Taṃ puggalaṃ niccanimitta subhanimitta sukhanimitta attanimittāni gāhenti.
anya-e0401n0:419_15: Taṃ puggalaṃ ārammaṇesu bhusaṃ nihitaṃ niviṭṭhaṃ karonti.
anya-e0401n0:419_17: Te ca maggaphalāni ārammaṇaṃ na karonti.
anya-e0401n0:419_19: Evaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇā divasena maggaphalesu tesaṃ abhāvo.
anya-e0401n0:419_20: Abhāvattāeva ca tāni maggaphalāni attano dhammatāya tīṇināmāni labhantīti dassetuṃ “ārammaṇa karaṇavasenavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:420_0: “Attadiṭṭhiyā uppannāya uppajjantī”ti idaṃ tāsaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ attadiṭṭhiyā avinābhāvaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0401n0:420_1: Na pana attadiṭṭhiyā tāhi avinābhāvanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:420_5: Diṭṭhivicikicchāsampayuttā akusaladhammā diṭṭhivicikicchāggahaṇena gahitāti āha “diṭṭhivicikicchā vippayuttā”ti.
anya-e0401n0:420_26: Vikappatthehi sati dve eva sattakkhattuparamā labbhanti.
anya-e0401n0:420_29: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana samuccayatthassa gahitattā eko missakabhavo eva labbhati.
anya-e0401n0:420_30: Nanu ca saddo nāma samuccayatthe pākaṭo,
anya-e0401n0:420_32: Tasmā samuccayatthova idha yuttoti ce. Na yutto. Kasmā.
anya-e0401n0:420_34: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana samuccayatthaṃ gahetvā te dve puggalā imasmiṃ pāṭhe asaṅgahitāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:420_37: Na hi koci sattakkhattu paramo nāma idha asaṅgahitoti yuttoti.
anya-e0401n0:420_40: Paramo nāma vutto”ti idaṃ upari ‘ye kāmabhave yevā’tiādinā ‘yediṭṭha dhamme vā’tiādinā ca yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:420_41: So ca sukkhavipassako vā parihīnajjhāno vā daṭṭhabboti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:420_43: “Idha niṭṭhā”ti imasmiṃ kāmaloke āsavakkhayaṃ patvā khandhaparinibbānapatti vasena niṭṭhā.
anya-e0401n0:420_47: Ekameva paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṃ bhavabījaṃ assa atthīti ekabījī.
anya-e0401n0:420_50: Kena pana tiṇṇaṃ sotāpannānaṃ viseso katoti.
anya-e0401n0:420_51: Sattakkhattu paramo tāva kevalaṃ pathamamagga sampayuttehi indriyehi kato.
anya-e0401n0:420_52: Itare dve uparimaggatthāya pavattitehi vipassanindriyehi katoti.
anya-e0401n0:420_63: Tattha sattakkhattu paramo kevalena pathamamaggānubhāvena siddhattā sabbamuduko hoti.
anya-e0401n0:420_64: Itare dvepakatiyā sattakkhattu paramabhāve ṭhatvā uparimaggatthāya vipassanā kammaṃ paṭṭhapenti.
anya-e0401n0:420_65: Tadā tesaṃ indriyāni puna visesa pattāni honti, tikkhāni.
anya-e0401n0:420_66: Tasmā te sattakkhattu paramato tikkhānāma hontīti.
anya-e0401n0:420_67: “Sattavārato oraṃ vā”ti idaṃ kolaṃkola ekabījino sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:420_68: “Upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā niyāmetī”ti idaṃ uparime dvesotāpanne sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:420_70: Tathāhi soyeva saṅgahapāṭhe sarūpato āgato sotāpatti maggaṃ bhāvetvā diṭṭhivicikicchāpahānena pahīnāpāyagamano
anya-e0401n0:420_72: Itare pana dve pāḷiyaṃ sotāpanna puggalavibhāgaṭṭhānesveva āgatāti.
anya-e0401n0:420_76: Aṅguttarapāṭhe “tenacittappasādenā”ti mahāsahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpetuṃ samatthassa satthuguṇe cittappasādo jāyati.
anya-e0401n0:420_78: “Tena pariyāyenā”ti sace so devesu eva saṃsarati.
anya-e0401n0:420_79: Sattakkhattuṃ opapātika paṭisandhiyo gaṇhitvā tattheva parinibbāyissati.
anya-e0401n0:420_82: Evaṃ desanā vārena cuddasa katvā desitena pariyāyenāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:420_83: “Taṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ”ti vadantena ṭīkācariyena sayaṃ cuddasapaṭisandhiyova icchatīti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n0:420_94: “Abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇassā”ti sattabhavato uddhaṃ kāmabhave paṭisandhijanakassa kusalā kusalakamma viññāṇassa.
anya-e0401n0:420_98: Ete nāma rūpadhammā ettha etasmiṃ abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇa nirodhakkhaṇe nirujjhantīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:420_100: “Tadekaṭṭhamohassā”ti tena rāgena tena dosena ekasmiṃ citte ekato ṭhitassa mohassa.
anya-e0401n0:420_111: Adhiccuppatti nāma pubbe yathāpavattaṃ kālaṃ adhicca atikkamma uppatti.
anya-e0401n0:420_114: “Methunavatthu samāyogo icchito”ti jāyampatīnaṃ methunakammasamāyogo nāma sakadāgāmīnaṃ atthīti icchito.
anya-e0401n0:420_122: Keci imaṃ vatthuṃ disvā mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ na rocenti.
anya-e0401n0:420_125: “Sakadāgāmittaṃ byākataṃ”ti tasmiṃ kālaṅkate so brāhmaṇo idha sakadāgāmibhāvaṃ patvā tusitākāyaṃ upapannoti
anya-e0401n0:420_126: evaṃ tassa yaṃ sakadāgāmittaṃ bhagavatā byākataṃ.
anya-e0401n0:420_128: Na pana abrahmacārino sato adhigamavasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:420_129: Maraṇāsannakālepi hi sikkhāpadādhiṭṭhānena saha uparimaggaphalādhigamanaṃ nāma tikkhapaññassa ariyasāvakassa na dukkaranti.
anya-e0401n0:420_131: “Sakiṃdeva imaṃlokaṃ āgantvā”ti etena ito paralokaṃ gamanassa ca tato puna idhāgamanassa ca siddhattā
anya-e0401n0:420_132: ayaṃ puggalo suddhena magganiyāmena kāmabhave dvikkhattu paramonāma hotīti siddho. Kathaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:420_133: Idha patvā tattha nibbattitvā idha parinibbāyī,
anya-e0401n0:420_134: tattha patvā idha nibbattitvā tattha parinibbāyīti.
anya-e0401n0:420_135: Sesāpana cattāro vipassanāniyāmena siddhā hontīti viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:420_141: Ettha ca tīsu sotāpannesu ekosattakkhattu paramo eva magganiyāmena siddho.
anya-e0401n0:420_142: Sesā pana dve sotāpannā vipassanāniyāmena siddhā.
anya-e0401n0:420_143: Cha sakadāgāmīsu dve eva magganiyāmena siddhā.
anya-e0401n0:420_145: Tattha maggasiddhesu sotāpanna sakadāgāmīsu saṅkaro natthi.
anya-e0401n0:420_151: Āgamanasīlo āgamana dhammo hutvā sakadāgāmī nāmāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:420_157: Sīlakkhandhādiguṇā nāma sīlakkhandha samādhikkhandha paññākkhandha vimuttikkhandha vimuttiññāṇa dassanakkhandhaguṇā.
anya-e0401n0:420_165: Na pana vuttaṃ vīriyavāhī maggaṃ bhāvetīti.
anya-e0401n0:420_167: Kasmā pana vīriyavāhī maggaṃ bhāvetīti na vuttanti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n0:420_168: Maggaṃ bhāventassa nāma ādimhi diṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ pahānāya kammaṃ mahantaṃ hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:420_170: Tattha saddhā ca vicikicchā ca dve ujuppaṭipakkhā honti.
anya-e0401n0:420_180: Api ca saddhā attano visaye diṭṭhiṃ vidhamatiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:420_182: Tasmā āraddha vipassako aniccādīsu aveccappasādamattenapi diṭṭhivicikicchāyo pajahitvā saddhānusāribhāvañca
anya-e0401n0:420_184: Paññāya aniccādīni nijjhānakkhamaṃ katvā dhammānusāribhāvañca suṭṭhutaraṃ passitvā diṭṭhipattapaññā vimuttabhāvañca pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n0:420_185: Vīriyaṃ pana diṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ paṭipakkhamattampi na hoti.
anya-e0401n0:420_193: Kutopana attano sabhāvena diṭṭhivicikicchāyo pajahituṃ sakkhissati.
anya-e0401n0:420_194: Tasmā imasmiṃ ṭhāne vīriyavāhīti ca vīriyadhuroti ca na vuttoti.
anya-e0401n0:420_195: Kāyasakkhimhi pana saddhā ca paññā ca samabalā honti.
anya-e0401n0:420_196: Vīriyañca sayaṃ sammappadhānaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā tadubhayaṃ upabrūheti.
anya-e0401n0:420_197: So ca puggalo tadubhayabalena diṭṭhivicikicchādayo pajahitvā kāyasakkhibhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n0:420_198: Aṭṭhavimokkhe vā uppādetvā ubhatobhāga vimuttabhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n0:420_199: Imesu pana dvīsu puggalesu vīriyassa thāmo suṭṭhu pākaṭo.
anya-e0401n0:420_209: “Tayo antarā parinibbāyino”ti ettha āyukappassa pariyantaṃ apatvā antarā eva kilesaparinibbānapattā antarāparinibbāyī nāma.
anya-e0401n0:420_218: Vipassanā kammaṃ sasaṅkhāraṃ sappayogaṃ katvā parinibbāyī sasaṅkhāra parinibbāyī.
anya-e0401n0:420_219: Saṅkhārarahitena sukhena vipassanā kammena parinibbāyī asaṅkhāra parinibbāyī.
anya-e0401n0:420_221: Te eva catūhi paṭipadāhi guṇitā dvādasa.
anya-e0401n0:421_5: Āruppesu ca tasso arūpasamāpattiyo eva atthi.
anya-e0401n0:421_12: Nānattasaññā nāma kasiṇa nimittato aññesu nānārammaṇesu pavattamanoviññāṇa saññā.
anya-e0401n0:421_13: Dutīyajjhāne vitakka vicārānaṃ nirodhotiādinā anupubba nirodho.
anya-e0401n0:421_19: “Samāpajjana vuṭṭhāna vipassanāvasenā”ti ettha vasibhāvapattaṃ samāpajjanañca vuṭṭhānañca gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:421_20: Attano sarīrā baddhesu parikkhāresu samāpattibaleneva antarāyābhāvato visuṃ adhiṭṭhātabba kiccaṃ natthīti
anya-e0401n0:421_29: Maraṇañhi nāma samāpattibalenapi paṭibāhituṃ na sakkāhoti.
anya-e0401n0:421_30: Anto samāpattiyañca maraṇe sati sabrahmacārīsu kattabbavattaṃ na kareyya.
anya-e0401n0:421_31: Etañhi vattaṃ yaṃ ariyasāvakānaṃ maraṇāsanne sabrahmacārīnaṃ vā upaṭṭhākānaṃ vā appamādakathānu sāsanikammaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:421_35: Yaṃ samāpajjanto asuko bhikkhu maraṇaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0401n0:422_4: Tattha ye loke iṭṭha kanta manāpiyā pañcakāmaguṇā nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n0:422_8: Yaṃ loke dibbaṃ sukhaṃ mānusakaṃ sukhanti mamāyanti.
anya-e0401n0:422_9: Yañca anubhavantaṃ mahājanaṃ sabbāni apāyabhaya vaṭṭabhayāni samparivārenti.
anya-e0401n0:422_10: Jhānasukha maggasukha phalasukha nibbānasukhaṃ pana nirāmisasukhaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:422_11: Yaṃ nekkhammasukhanti ca pavivekasukhanti ca upasamasukhanti ca sambodhisukhanti ca vimuttisukhanti ca ariyasukhanti ca anavajjasukhanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:422_12: Yañca anubhavantaṃ ariyajanaṃ sabbāni apāyabhaya vaṭṭabhayāni samparivajjanti.
anya-e0401n0:422_13: “Assāditabbaṭṭhenā”ti kilesapalibodhehi vimuttattā vipula gambhīra santa paṇītarasattā ca ahosukhaṃ ahosukhanti udāharantenapi assāditabbaṭṭhenāti.
anya-e0401n0:425_8: “Abhivuḍḍhānaṃ”ti hānabhāgiya ṭhitibhāgiyabhāvaṃ atikkammavisesabhāgiya nibbedhabhāgiya bhāvapattivasena atissaya vuḍḍhānaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:425_13: Nampo iti avhayo assāti nampavhayoti vacanattho.
anya-e0401n0:425_19: Kathaṃ nu kho ime janā abhidhammatthesu sukhena ājāneyyunti evaṃ pavatto cittabyāpāro.
anya-e0401n0:425_22: “Patthitaṃ”ti vā sādhuvatassa yaṃ thero evarūpaṃ pakaraṇaṃ kareyyāti evaṃ cirakālaṃ patthitaṃ āsiṃsitanti attho.
anya-e0401n0:425_27: “Saddo”ti kasmā rājā evarūpaṃ maṅgalahatthiṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0401n0:425_28: Netaṃ patirūpaṃ yaṃ raññā katanti evaṃ pavatto amanāpasaddo.
anya-e0401n0:425_36: nānābhayupaddavā tasmiṃ nuppajjantīti lokasammato maṅgalahatthī hoti.
anya-e0401n0:425_53: Taṃ ādi etissā paññāyāti pariyattivesārajjādi paññā.
anya-e0401n0:425_55: Pāpaṃ dhammaṃ garahantiādīnavaṃ kathayanti sīlenāti pāpagarahino.
anya-e0401n0:425_61: Loke bahūsu dassanesu ito uttaraṃ aññaṃ dassanaṃ nāma natthīti dassanānuttariyaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:425_66: Tesu ratanattayādīsu saddhā paṭilābho lābhānuttariyaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:425_68: Ratanattaye catūhi paccayehi vā vattappaṭivattakaraṇena vā paricaraṇaṃ pāricariyānuttariyaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:425_69: Buddhapaññattāsu tīsu sikkhāsu samādāya sikkhanaṃ sikkhānuttariyaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:425_70: Tādise paññāvadātaguṇasobhādike guṇe avassaṃ bhajanti pāpuṇantīti tādisaguṇabhāgino.
anya-e0401n0:427_10: āgate aññattha gantuṃ na detīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:427_12: “Sāke”ti sākanāmena raññā puna saṅkhatattā imaṃ kaliyugaṃ sākanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:427_14: Sākarājā ca nāma uttarāpathesu eko gandhārarājā.
anya-e0401n0:427_15: Yaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā bhinnaladdhikā vajjībhikkhū imaṃ dhamma vinayaṃ mahāsaṅghīkaṃ nāma saṅgahaṃ āropenti.
anya-e0401n0:427_26: “La tī”ti sālikkhettānaṃ sodhanaṭṭhānattā evaṃ mrammadesavohārena laddhanāmaṃ araññaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:427_27: Taṃ pana muṃrvānagarassa esanne pañcadhanusatike padese jātaṃ.
anya-e0401n0:427_29: Sārañca asārañca vivecenti vicāretvā jānantisīlenāti sārāsāra vivekinoti vacanatthoti.
anya-e0401n0:429_0: 1. Paramatthadīpanī nāma, yena therena sā katā.
anya-e0401n0:430_0: Teneve sā katā hoti, ayaṃ tassānu dīpanī.
anya-e0401n0:432_0: Kāḷe navamiyaṃ divā, majjhanhike niṭṭhaṃ gatā.
